name: Darkness Road
description:
Darkness Road is an immersive survival horror and psychological horror game that will plunge players into a chilling and nightmarish experience. Set in the year 1996, within the foreboding town of Dar Al Hai located in the Arabian Gulf, this game offers a unique blend of suspenseful gameplay and captivating storytelling.

Playing from a third-person perspective, you assume the role of Hamdan, an ordinary 34-year-old resident of Dar Al Hai. Suddenly and inexplicably abducted, Hamdan finds himself trapped within a cursed place. With every ounce of his being, he strives to escape the clutches of this malevolent force, only to discover that his efforts seem to lead him deeper into the darkness.

name: Perdition
description: Perdition is a atmospheric and story-driven 2D Platformer. Set in a metallic wasteland of death and decay, the player takes the role of an android who has "awakened," achieving free thought and self-awareness. Players can explore what remains of the world, choosing whether to obey or disobey the commands of an unforgiving, sadistic god.

name: Café Mania
description: A restaurant business simulator which was very popular in Brazil.

name: MegaCity
description: A city administration simulator which was popular in Brazil.

name: Vila Mágica
description: Sin descripción

name: Tomato Bounce
description: Help the tomatoes escape the dreaded salad! Bounce them across the kitchen to the table using the spatula. Be on the lookout for power ups, some will help while others will hurt.

name: Segredos do Mar
description: Sin descripción

name: Pet Mania
description: A pet simulator for social networks.

name: Mini Fazenda
description: Sin descripción

name: Tanked Up
description: Use both your shooting and driving skills to cross the finish line first.

name: Hexagolines
description:
Hexagolines, the block puzzle game that challenges you to strategically form lines in a hexagonal grid! Dive into a captivating world where strategic space clearing is the key to success.

No internet connection required, Hexagolines is the perfect companion for your commute or leisure time. Explore various block shapes, such as C, V, O, line, triangle, Z, and more, and cleverly use them to create lines in the hexagonal grid.

The simple and addictive gameplay allows you to drag and drop blocks to form lines. But beware, each completed line clears space for new blocks, so you must think carefully about each move to maximize your score.

Hexagolines offers six unique game modes to cater to all players. Immerse yourself in the infinite mode and keep playing as long as there is space for the remaining blocks, or challenge the clock in timed modes where you have 4 minutes to achieve the highest score.

Compete with friends and family to reach the top scores and become the master of Hexagolines. Train your thinking skills and have fun while playing Hexagolines, as block puzzle games are known to stimulate thinking and problem-solving abilities.

name: Five Nights at Roblox 2 RePartyin
description: It’s been awhile ever since Roblox Chill Hangout was shutdown. Even after 2 shutdowns, Blox Entertainment still wants to continue making more places. With NPCs becoming smarter, Blox Entertainment want to move forward with this technology creating newer and better bots. Roblox Corp gives them one more chance. Roblox Party Area was born.

name: RobloxTale: Noob Fight
description: RobloxTale: Noob Fight is an Undertale fangame that puts the player in a custom boss battle against the Roblox noob.

name: Hentai Literature Club
description: Hentai Literature Club is an 18+ fanmade visual novel based on Doki Doki Literature Club.

name: Flappy Outside
description: Flappy Outside is a clone of the mobile game Flappy Bird based around the "Cash Me Outside" meme.

name: Virtual Pro-Wrestling 2: Freem Edition
description: Virtual Pro-Wrestling 2: Freem Edition is a hack of AKI Corporation's Virtual Pro-Wrestling 2 on the Nintendo 64. The hack replaces various default VPW2 wrestlers with other wrestlers, most of whom have been in other AKI wrestling games

name: Fantasy Defenders Bundle: Defend the Rook & Legend of Keepers
description: Experience two fantasy turn-based strategies: Card Battle Legend of Keepers and Defend the Rook - a roguelike tactic.

name: Fort Solis: Terra Edition
description:
Fort Solis is a riveting story-driven thriller on the Red Planet.

The Terra Edition includes:
- Fort Solis the game
- Fort Solis Extras (Artbook & OST)

name: The Lost Glitches
description: The Lost Glitches is a Techno-Optimist set Trading Card Game with RPG progression. Head-to-head PvP battles require strategy, unique deck construction and clever wits to climb the ladder.

name: Aevitas
description: Aevitas is a digital world where you hold the key to its creation and ownership.

name: The Crackpet Show: Happy Tree Friends Edition
description: The Crackpet Show is an action-packed rogue-lite shoot'em-up about mutated animals that fight in a bizarre TV show, crushing their opponents with a variety of weapons. Choose your beastie, gear ‘em up, and go kill your enemies in the name of fame and sweet sponsorship deals!

name: Lust Element: Season 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Book of Hours: Perpetual Edition DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: Pirate Bloopers
description: Pirate Bloopers is an isometric action game in the style of "time survival" where you take a control of a ship in the dangerous waters of the Pirate Bay. The sea is calling!

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Couch Co-op Edition
description:
This bundle includes base game, Expansion Pack #2 and Multiplayer Mode with:

• 15 new levels and 7 new achievements
• local multiplayer gameplay mode, allowing players to team up and play together. It adds a new layer of excitement and replayability to the game, while providing a fun and engaging experience for players to enjoy with friends and family.

name: Mr. Hibbl: The Lost Levels
description:
In Mr. Hibbl: Lost Levels we have released lost levels that send Mr. Hibbl on a whole new journey! Join our brave hero on an exciting adventure through mysterious worlds long forgotten.
Explore mysterious environments, face tricky challenges and overcome exciting traps as you explore the lost levels.
Immerse yourself in a unique gameplay experience that features gripping action and surprising twists.
Are you ready to face this unknown challenge and join Mr. Hibbl on his new journey?
Good luck and may your adventure begin!

name: ATV Monster Racing Simulator Rally Cross
description: Are you ready for the ultimate ATV off-road racing adventure?

name: Crime Zone
description:
Enter the Crime Zone. Move it, Move it. Catch the perps. You are drawn to a mysterious hotel. You are repeatedly drawn to this mysterious hotel. Protect And Serve. It's just another day in the Crime Zone.

Originally released August 2011 for Ludum Dare. Made in Adventure Game Studio.

name: Der Pfad des Pinguins
description:
You wake up in a snow-covered landscape and can't remember anything. You have to find out how you got to this place and survive. On your journey you meet penguins who confront you with a mysterious disease. Can you help the penguins?

This is a RPG Adventure Game!

name: Internet Cafe Creator
description: Internet Cafe Creator is a new type of gameplay in the internet cafe game series. Build, expand, buy computers, hire staff, fight off bandits - all this wait you in this great game!

name: RoboHunters
description: Top-down 3D action shooter. Fight against swarms of rogue AI machines and survive as long as you can!

name: Validus Mortis
description: Validus Mortis is a 2D platformer in fantasy style. To stop the evil wizards of taking control of the land. explore the stage with your hero knight and find items to progress forward. Slay monsters and gain experience and new spells.

name: The Queen's Quest
description: “The Queen's Quest” is a fantasy point-and-click adventure game and Yuri dating sim. Play as Elysia Fernwhisper as she goes on an epic quest for Queen Drusilla that takes her across her vast and majestic kingdom. Along the way she will meet many beautiful women and may even fall in love!

name: Never Ending Nightmare
description: Life has been tough for you after the tragic incident with your parents. Your way of coping has been through reliving all the good memories with them, but all the memories had a dark turn this time... will you be able to figure out why?

name: Arrow a Row
description: Arrow a row is a game in which you shoot arrows (of course) in a row! or maybe two rows! (maybe three?) Choose your power-ups and defeat the Boss.

name: Hexceed: Metallicum Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Metallicum Puzzle your way through 200 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws Pack: Variety Pack 10
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Slaughter Family Execution Pack 1
description: Unleash terror on your Victims with these new gut-wrenching executions for the Slaughter Family! This pack features one kill each for Leatherface, The Cook, The Hitchhiker, Sissy, and Johnny. Happy hunting!

name: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk: Base & Jay
description: Two new writers, Base and Jay, are coming in from out of town to support the BRC crew.

name: Attenborough's Antarctic: An Exploration of Life in the Freezer
description:
This is a program of exploration and discovery with David Attenborough as your guide. Go wherever your fancy takes you, and experience the savageness, beauty and abundance of life in the coldest place on Earth.
Welcome to the South Pole and the surrounding area, one of the most extraordinary places on our planet. In this richly illustrated title, you can investigate the Antarctic terrain, its seasons and the animals that live there.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Trident of Power
description: The Trident of Power is a Zelda fangame developed by Pizus, under RPG Maker 2003. It offers a very complete experience with both battles and puzzles and a complete storyline taking place in both Hyrule and the neighboring country of Tylistem. The game is available in both Spanish and English

name: Notes of the Outskirts
description:
Close future. Rumors say megacorps are getting mad over a possible treasure. Bandits, mercenaries and opportunistic merchants are showing up, and of course you're too. Whatever it is, you're determined to find it and sell it to whoever will propose the best price. That's where the adventure begins.

Note of the outskirts is a classic party-based role playing game in the vein of titles such as the original Wasteland.

name: Discovering Endangered Wildlife
description: An interactive program endorsed by David Bellamy, designed to help children and parents learn about animals and wildlife in danger of becoming extinct.

name: Titan 2
description: Titan 2 is a ten-level Doom II episode mod, created by Jesper Krag Rasmussen (Ixnatifual) and released on January 21, 2009. Built for GZDoom, it is the sequel to 2004's Titan and follows the protagonist's attempts to escape Hell and return to the moonbase. It once again features several custom enemies as well as a new weapon, the minigun.

name: 15 Years a Doomer
description: 15 Years a Doomer was a mapping contest held from March 22 to March 29, 2021. The event was organized by James Paddock (Jimmy) to celebrate his 15th year anniversary in the Doom community.

name: The Walking Dead: Destinies
description: Begin your journey as Rick Grimes, waking alone in a hospital surrounded by the dead. Assemble allies and fight your way through the walker apocalypse across iconic locations from The Walking Dead, including Atlanta, the Greene family farm, the prison, and Woodbury. In crucial choice-driven moments, you’ll forever shape the destiny of your team of characters from the series. Heroes and villains, living and dead – it’s up to you to decide whether to stay the course of history or forge your own path through the world of AMC’s The Walking Dead.

name: Maou Shoujo Eri
description:
Created in Wolf RPG Editor by yako, this is a puzzle game where the player must navigate dungeons, evading enemies and traps in order to save a kidnapped girl from the Evil Lord. The objective is to reach the end of every map before a timer runs out. The player character can destroy any enemy just by body slamming it into oblivion at the cost of HP equal to the level of the enemy. It is also possible to restore 30 HP with the press of a button in exchange for 1 second on the timer.

The player must find the most optimal route in every map, managing health and trying to find all the secrets hidden in the game, while still reaching the exit point of the map on time.

name: CyberGroove
description: CyberGroove is one of the oldest known DDR clones released for PCs. In Taiwan, it was released as an "upgrade" to Dance 2000.

name: Arctic Outpost
description: The map was designed to be SP only, for GZDoom (works fine in 3.3.1) and so jumping, crouching and freelook is allowed, the arctic setting was originally inspired by 'The Thing', however it soon evolved into a more traditional doom map. This was a submission for the Vinesauce Mapping Contest II.

name: Eternal Damnation
description: Eternal Damnation is an 4 level mapset for Ultimate Doom, where each map is themed after each of the 4 episodes of the original Ultimate Doom.

name: Spidersilk
description: A dungeon map with a strange layout. Skill 3 & 4 are linear while skill 2 (marked especially so you can immediately see there's an alternate game mode) is a mad dash for supplies. Some monster behaviour has been changed!

name: En Campaña
description: One last map before my surgery for scoliosis. This one's a small limit-removing stroll. Only 94 monsters. It should take you no more than 7 or 8 minutes to beat on your first go.

name: Stimulants
description: A small compilation consisting of 5 speedmaps, each playable from pistol start and involving challenging gameplay scenarios.

name: Sun Lotion On My Curvy Asscheeks
description:
Sun Lotion On My Curvy Asscheeks is a 5-map episode for the Supercharge gameplay mod. The maps are laidback and quick, with the episode taking no more than 30 minutes. Take a shot of that late summer heat if you didn't get enough sun somehow.
Difficulties supported. Co-op has 4 spawn points but no additional enemies or items

name: Bloodicide
description: Bloodicide is a 5 level mapset for GZDoom (4.0.0). This latest build now features @Tango's Supercharge (v1.3) gameplay mod. The mapset and mod are packaged as a single pk3, so you don't need to load the mod separately to play.

name: Moving
description:
Your name is Jay, you've had a long day, and now it's time to move.

In this WAD, you clear out an apartment while listening to somebody on the phone.
Your only task is to move objects. There is no horror element, no secret ARG, you can't even die or fail.
It's a short, relaxing experience throughout. Takes 15-20 minutes to complete.

Features excellent voice acting, custom music, and quite possibly the cutest Doomcute that you've ever seen.
Closed captions are also included, so you can play the game without sound if needed (though sound is recommended).

Inspired by the house cleaning section from "The Beginner's Guide", as well as games like "What Remains of Edith Finch" and "Gone Home". If you're a fan of Walking Simulators, you'll feel right at home. If not, there's probably little to win you over. ﻿

name: Valorant : Antivax Addition
description: Valorant is an 8(7 + 1 Bonus) map MBF21 episode based around that one other mod that a couple people played. The maps are built for high intensity with consistent flow, and are filled to the brim with custom content.

name: Baphomet's Satellite
description: Baphomet's Satellite (Important: play with complevel 11) is an adventure map in outer space. You'll have to explore and traverse some kind of space station built entirely from Hell's corrupted reality! Manage your ammo carefully and explore as much as you can. You can always turn around and look for supplies before engaging with the demons.

name: Persephone Volumes 1 to 3
description: This version of Persephone is a compilation of Volumes 1, 2 and 3. Volume 1 is an episode of 8 main maps, plus a secret level and a scripted "Cast and Crew" map, whilst Volume 2 is an episode of 10 playable maps and Volume 3 is 14 playable maps. Where necessary for compilation purposes, maps and resources have been tweaked or altered. MAP14 has had a game play overhaul from how it appeared in the Ten Community Project so that the co-op only part of it is also included in the single-player experience. Some minor fixes have been applied to the individual volumes in this compilation process.

name: Dracula Cha Cha
description: Inspired by Konami's Tomena Sanner, Dracula Cha Cha tells the festive adventures of everyone's favorite non-reflective aristocrat. Help the Count as he karate kicks snowmen, dances with Grinch Girls, plays rock-paper-scissors with reindeer, and much more!

name: The Final Pin
description:
"The Final Pin" is a full length story based game with voice acting and horror elements that will keep you on the edge of your seat.
You'll need to use your investigative skills and survival instincts to navigate the treacherous world of the crow killer and uncover the truth behind the town's dark past.
Each step you take is a closer step into the darkness.

name: Playtime with Percy
description: Playtime with Percy is a traditional-styled FNaF fangame with the primary gameplay structure being revolved around The Pal Percy; a Tamagotchi-like toy. With the core gameplay loop being “Tasked Based / End at Your Own Pace” instead of the classic “Survive from 12AM to 6AM” formula.

name: Divergence
description: Sin descripción

name: Vine Mapping Contest 2016
description: The Vine Mapping Contest 2016 was an event organized by Joel "Vargskelethor" Johannson of the Vinesauce streaming team. The terms were simple: make a WAD with up to three maps, playable in ZDoom or GZDoom.

name: Doom Mapping Contest II: Hellectric Boogaloo
description: The Doom Mapping Contest II: Hellectric Boogaloo, in 2018, was the second event organized by Joel "Vargskelethor" Johannson of Vinesauce, the followup to Vine Mapping Contest 2016. The rules were to make a single map, for GZDoom, and to not use any copyrighted MP3 music that could cause DMCA issues when streamed.

name: World2D Re
description:
In this short game in a 2.5d world pass the levels and each level will face new challenges
increasingly difficult.

name: Yume Nikki: Dream Dairy
description: Madotsuki has left her room and gotten a job at a milkshake cafe. A point-and-click game where you must help her make drinks for the customers.

name: Unwelcome
description: An unsettling journey through a noir-ish set of maps, primarily focused on a grey/blue/pink color theme and each individual map has its own gimmick

name: Darkness Flaw
description: This map was created to test my skills in vanilla mapping. I liked how results turned out and decided to submit it here. Map is short and quick and it shouldn't take too long to finish.

name: Cubic Worlds
description: Each map is independent and should be done from pistol start. ﻿Contains a bunch of new monsters and one new weapon (﻿all taken from various sources, nothing origin﻿﻿al yet.)

name: Greymood
description: I tried express my depressive feeling through grey, brown and white textures. Music choice was accident, which perfectly fitted in this kind of map. I recommend turn off infinite height, but it's not important.

name: MedEvil
description: Three small to medium-sized levels with a gothic castle theme. Balanced for pistol start, with difficulties implemented.

name: Deviled
description: This map was created for vinesauce mapping contest, which happened in 2018. It got renamed from "dual layered violence" to "deviled". This version is more improved and more detailed than my contest version.

name: Time Parallax: The Burial Vault
description: Originally created for Vinesauce contest 2, as it turned out later, the map was literally packed with bugs, even though it was generally passable.

name: 10 Levels: 10 Monsters
description: Sin descripción

name: Light Pollution
description: One big map with lots of enemies, but most of them are low health ones. Is very difficult on UV however, so maybe you will try HMP first. ﻿

name: Can't Run Frm Evil
description: These levels are the first four of them, and they are the bigger too. All maps can be finished starting with pistol only. Maps are hard, but difficult levels are implemented.

name: Next Move
description: Next Move is a VR platformer where all movement corresponds to the player's movement. Your ability to run, jump and climb will be put to the test on a journey into dreamy worlds filled with fantastic architecture. But to succeed, you must also fight off enemies and eventually even manipulate time.

name: Warlock The Bounty Hunter
description: A short byte-sized roguelike game where you play as a warlock taking bounties.

name: Rampage Agents
description: Rampage Agents is a VR game that fuses battle royale with multi-player action adventure games. Obtain powerful agents with unique powers and team up with your friends now!

name: Murder on Mainstreet
description: A commercially released port of Caper in the Castro with all LGBT content removed

name: Railroad Corporation: Competitive Spirit DLC
description: This DLC is a set of different sandbox missions featured with AI competitors. A special interactive mode is available for a relaxed and interesting long-time play.

name: Daemon X Machina: The Witcher Costume Pack
description: Gearlt And Ciri from the Witcher series arrive in Daemon X Machina as outfits

name: Cursed Realms: Path Over The Abyss
description: Cursed Realms - Path Over The Abyss is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and the GZDoom source port. It was created by StormCatcher.77 in 2016 and uses the music track "Claustrophobia" by Vladislav Baymurzin (ClumsyDoomer) from the Plutonia MIDI Pack. It was awarded third place in the Vine Mapping Contest 2016.

name: Shovelware Adventure!
description: Welcome to Shovelware Adventure! This is a 100% vanilla compatible wad & dehacked file for DOOM II. This map is full of bloody battle arenas and slimy passageways! There are many secrets to discover and several paths to reach the exit. This map was designed with a high quality but oldschool 90's style in mind, the little gems with quirky graphic edits that you find on those old discs among 1000 random wadfiles - hence the name Shovelware Adventure. It's meant to feel like a mini-episode despite being just one lone map. The objective is to pump rockets into the core and blow the place up!

name: Ale & Aftercare
description:
Even heroes need somewhere to rest their heads. That's where the Aftercare Inn comes in! Situated between all the most dangerous areas in the realm, it serves as the common gathering place for adventurers to rest and recuperate.

Take on the role of the Innkeeper, the gender-customizable proprietor of the Aftercare Inn, as they provide sustenance and satisfaction to all kinds of adventurers. They all need a roof over their head, a hot bowl of porridge, and sometimes a little bit more... and the innkeeper is happy to help!

Enjoy an engaging, sex-positive, and LGBTQ-friendly fantasy story about polyamory, gentle domination, and the fulfilling ways sexuality can contribute to our lives.

Choose your pronouns, anatomy, and name to create an experience tailored to you. The dialogue and sex scenes all adjust to match your chosen identity!

Enjoy fully-illustrated sex scenes with five unique characters, all themed around gentle domination and affirming, caring sex. And if that's not your speed, turn explicit content off in the options to enjoy the story without the sexy parts!

name: Steep Town
description: A map for Doom 2 that was submitted to the Vinesauce Doom level contest. This version is much more fleshed out though.

name: Distribution Center
description: Distribution Center is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using the GZDoom source port. It was designed by Blake Collins (Rayzik) and uses the music track "The Imp's Song" by Robert Prince. Distribution Center was originally created in 2016 for the Vine Mapping Contest 2016, where it went on to win first place, and was publicly released in 2017.

name: Lighthouse
description: Lighthouse (a.k.a. FARO.WAD) is a single-level PWAD for Doom II and the ZDoom source port. It was designed by Angry Saint, uses the music track "Blood Jungle" by Jonathan El-Bizri, and was also submitted to the Vine Mapping Contest 2016.

name: Nightlife
description: Nightlife is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using the GZDoom source port. It was created by Joshua O'Sullivan (Dragonfly), uses the music track "Different Heaven" by Nekozilla, and was his submission to the Vine Mapping Contest 2016.

name: 4 Seasons of Doom
description: 4 maps themed after each one of the 4 seasons.

name: Soundless Mound
description: Soundless Mound is a single-level PK7 for Doom II using the GZDoom source port. It was designed by Marisa Lago in 2018 and is inspired by the Silent Hill series of survival horror games. In the Doom Mapping Contest II: Hellectric Boogaloo, it was awarded first place, and it received further updates via the author's GitHub repository.

name: Redundancy
description: A 32 map wad made during the month of october for NaNoWADMo 2019, using only textures and monsters from doom2. Every map has at least 2 of each key that appears on it, same for weapons, also each map has 2 exits.

name: Blood and Bones: A Skeleton Scorned
description:
You were but broken bones and brawny blood. Yet your tomb stirs, and here you stand!

This was a map created for the Vinesauce Mapping Contest 2016. It has a standalone release now. It's mostly unchanged from the one submitted to the contest, the only difference is it has a titlepic this time around.

name: Oscillation
description: 9 boom compatible maps of increasing difficulty

name: NERF Legends: Elite Blaster Combo Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyperforma: Lost Archives - Fragment I
description:
Embark on an immersive journey and get lost archives with a new DLC Lost Archives — Fragment I.

This DLC includes 30 additional levels. Every 10 new levels refer to specific bosses with all their associated design and mechanics.

Features:

・10 new levels in Oracle
・10 new levels in Guardian
・10 new levels in Ghost
・New mechanics to activate the skills

Secrets of the vanished civilization await to be unveiled!

name: Hyperforma: Lost Archives - Fragment II
description:
Delve deeper into the Ancient Network with a new DLC Lost Archives — Fragment II.

This DLC includes 30 additional levels. Every 10 new levels refer to specific bosses with all their associated design and mechanics.

Features:

10 new levels in Joker
10 new levels in Warrior
10 new levels in Mother

Uncover the truth of Hyperforma!

name: Luck Breaker
description: In Luck Breaker, your task is to determine the number of dice to remove using the dice.

name: Candle Fire Run!
description:
Candle Fire Run! is an exciting arcade game where players take on the role of a candle and embark on an exciting adventure, trying not to burn out and reach the finish line.

Your goal is to complete a series of levels while collecting power-ups to increase your size and extend your burning time.

name: Xtreme Sports
description: The Xtreme Sports showdown has begun! Play as Guppi or her boyfriend Fin as they visit Xtreme Island and aim to become Xtreme Sports Champion by mastering five events - skateboarding, street luge, in-line skating,

name: The Nightmare: Serial Killers
description: An astute killer infiltrates the dreams of his victims, sowing mental chaos until their death. Five days, five victims and multiple alternative endings.

name: Eroblast: Passion Edition
description:
In this bundle you get content from the base game and Passion Pack which includes:
- 21 romanceable women to meet
- 120+ hot pics to unlock
- over 30 routes to go with each waifu, with between 5.000 to 10.000 words each
- 280 levels to beat
- 25+ hours of gameplay so get ready for flirting and pics!

name: Word Search Puzzle: Find the Words!
description: Word Search is a classic word puzzle to search for words! Spell the words and the word puzzles will be completed!

name: Hidden Paws Bundle
description: Put your paws to work!

name: Mugen Souls Double Pack
description: Experience both cult classic JRPGs with content true to the Japanese originals!

name: Zombie Outbreak: Survival in Ancient Egyptian
description: Immerse yourself in ancient Egypt as you've never seen it before: Ravaged by a zombie apocalypse. Your survival depends on every choice you make in this engrossing horror game.

name: Hentai World: Complete Edition
description:
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all puzzles. These lovely girls will keep you company.

In this bundle, you will see student Sayuri and Rose in her new feline look.

name: Fashion Friends: Super Edition
description: This bundle includes base game and Special Levels with additional levels! New levels! New adventures! New fun!

name: Eroblast: Spicy Edition
description:
In this bundle you get content from the base game and Spicy Pack which includes:
- 21 romanceable women to meet
- 120+ hot pics to unlock
- over 30 routes to go with each waifu, with between 5.000 to 10.000 words each
- 280 levels to beat
- 25+ hours of gameplay so get ready for flirting and pics!

name: Infinity Strash: Dragon Quest - The Adventure of Dai: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Base Game
- Legendary Mage - Popp Outfit
- Legendary Priest and Legendary Martial Artist - Maam Outfits
- Legendary Swordsman and Legendary Warrior - Hyunckel Outfits

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit II

name: Stack Ball Run!
description: Stack Ball Run! is a 3D arcade game where you smash, push and jump over rotating spiral platforms to get to the end.

name: Trainz Plus: Model Trainz - UZ-Gbox
description: It is a mini model railroad with a track gauge of 1520mm. The map is highly detailed and has a good variety of scenery. Includes 2 small sessions with passenger trains.

name: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2024
description: Draft Day Sports: College Football 2023=4 puts you in the role of head coach for your favorite college football team. Recruit, gameplan and make the right calls on the field to lead your team to the top of the ranks and the college football championship.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: Model Trainz - UZ-Gbox
description: It is a mini model railroad with a track gauge of 1520mm. The map is highly detailed and has a good variety of scenery. Includes 2 small sessions with passenger trains.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Model Trainz - UZ-Gbox
description: It is a mini model railroad with a track gauge of 1520mm. The map is highly detailed and has a good variety of scenery. Includes 2 small sessions with passenger trains.

name: Truck Simulator Pro USA
description: Experience the ultimate trucking adventure with Truck Simulator Pro USA! Immerse yourself in the world of American trucking as you explore vast highways and breathtaking landscapes across the United States. Transport goods, take on challenging missions, and build your own trucking empire.

name: Road Drawing 3D
description: Road Drawing 3D is an addicting draw-to-move type of game. In order to move the ball, you have to draw. When release your finger, the ball will start moving accordingly to the drawn path. Extremely intuitive gameplay mechanic. Do your best to draw at the right direction so the ball does not bump into moving obstacles, walls, rotating objects, etc.

name: Zombie Mutant Run
description:
Download this cute and fun blue zombie mutant running game!
Fun for all ages and great way to past the time. Help the blue monster avoid obstacles and see how far you can help him go without falling. Simple to play yet hard to master.

name: Gorathar
description:
Embark on an adventure like no other with Gorathar, an innovative rogue-like deckbuilder game that combines engaging gameplay and an optional fitness integration.

Step into the shoes of Hoodin, an intrepid explorer and scientist who dives into a magical cave system - the only place in the world where magic exists. Your goal? To explore, challenge the cave's mysteries, and see how far you can progress without meeting your end.

In Gorathar, strategy is key. With a starting deck of action cards, every card you play is a step closer to defeating the cave's denizens and uncovering its secrets. After each successful encounter, reap rewards to enhance your gameplay and further your journey.

name: Survival Bowling
description:
Welcome to the definitive mashup of bowling and horde survival. In Survival Bowling, you use a limited supply of bowling balls to defeat waves of bowling pins. In each wave you will complete a typical game of ten-pin bowling. Typical, that is, except for the fact that the pins are coming to snatch up all your balls!
The pins are alive. They have arms, legs, and cruel intentions. They will advance down the lane towards your stash of bowling balls. If they make it all the way, they will steal a bunch and try to carry them back to the pit. But if you act fast, you can bowl them over as they retreat and get the balls back!
The game progresses as a series of waves with increasing difficulty. As you advance you will have more lanes to manage, the pins will get quicker, and they may start surprising you with some dirty tricks! At the end of each wave, you will receive reward balls for each spare, strike, and turkey you achieved. You will need to do well to earn enough balls to make it through the next wave. If you run out of balls, you will see the Game Over screen. You may use up to 3 continues to keep going, after which the game is truly over.

name: Rolling Down Bottles
description:
Ready for an exhilarating hyper-casual challenge? Test your skills as you guide the bottle down stairs, avoiding obstacles and daring jumps. It's a hilarious, addictive adventure that'll keep you hooked!
Unlock a variety of cool bottles with unique styles and personalities. Tap to play, conquer levels, and beat your high score in this fun-filled game. Download now and roll like never before!

name: Merge Circle
description: Merge Circle is an addictive and visually stunning hypercasual puzzle game that will captivate your mind and test your reflexes. Immerse yourself in a world of vibrant colors and nature vibes as you embark on a challenging journey to merge units and solve intricate puzzles.

name: Discordia by Iron Games
description: In 'Discordia', you develop your city by building farms, barracks, defenses, harbors, and markets, and by trading with ships. Use your seamen, soldiers, merchants, and farmers profitably, fulfill decrees, and secure privileges — acting carefully at all times so that your city grows neither too fast nor too slow. Will you have the best-developed city at the end of the fourth year and score many points, or will you manage to impress the empress before then and win the game early?

name: TwisTouch
description: Take every fire with its color but use one different finger for each fire! Totally crazy idea that give you fun and make you think too.

name: Picket Fences
description:
Can you trump the neighbors? Compete with the neighbors for the highest score in a series of zany home-themed rummy card games.
Achieve 'Full House' for a big bonus, or shoot for the risky, but rewarding high-end sets. Use bonus cards to make special plays against your opponents or gain additional points. Earn medals, awards, and badges as you advance through the card games.

name: Business Superstar Idle Tycoon
description:
Do you love money? Want to be rich and become a business superstar? Sure you do!
Play now as an entrepreneur, use strategy and manage your business in the most creative way possible to grow your corporate empire. Get rich from zero to hero!
Business Superstar is a business simulation game all about money, prestige and glory.

This game was created especially for math junkies. The goal is quite simple: You need to calculate a number that is located at the center of the screen. To receive maximum points you have to calculate absolutely all numbers on the level. If you able to do it on the all 37 levels – you will receive 814 points and damn you are really good in math!

name: 8bit Doves
description:
Trapped in a VR world powered by an ancient handheld device, you are forced to endlessly dream in a pixel world of just 4 colours! Doves have taken roost in your prison and though you don’t know it they are the key to your survival. The Doves subconsciously inspire dreams of flight, so take to the skies through the mazes of your imagination and find the exit.

Intuitive two button gameplay is all you need to steer your way through the sky. Fly through each stage and reach the exit. Get doves to follow you for extra bonus bragging rights on Game Center and Social Networking stuff. If walls aren’t enough challenge you may enjoy the variety of traps that get rapidly added including, moving walls, speed boost zones, growing walls and more!

name: Tumble Wrestling
description:
Tumble Wrestling is a casual physics based fighting game that challenges you to knock your opponent out of the ring.
There is a variety of wrestlers to chose from, each with a pro wrestling signature move that can be used to weaken or KO your opponent. Use power slams, irish whips, elbow drops, atomic drops, pile drivers and moves off the ropes to earn that win!
Early challengers will start out easy, but will become increasingly difficult as you fight your way to a title bout. As the game becomes more difficult, you must decide whether to go for the raw power ring out, or methodically pound your foe into into a daze and then go for the ring out. Let the mayhem begin!

name: Bulu Monster
description:
Monsters are the main theme of the exciting new app from Sigma Game. Bulu Monster allows the user to become a monster trainer on Bulu Island. Sigma Game believes this app will stand out from all of the other monster games on the market as Bulu Monster puts the user fully in control. In this role playing adventure game, the user must discover, capture, fight and train one of the 150 monsters. Bulu Monster also allows the user to engage with friends and with other trainers online, enabling them to challenge their friends and other players of the game.
Bulu Monster was some eighteen months in the making; Sigma Game has ensured that the app is of the quality that users will have come to expect. The high quality animation, adventurous storyline, and the ability to challenge both friends and other users online adds to the exhilarating, high energy feel of this game.
Bulu Monster leads the user on a unique adventure that is not available on other monster games. As well as enabling the user to capture monsters, the user can train them, too, and this is what makes Bulu Monster different to the other games that can be found out there.
For ease of play, Bulu Monster has a one-hand touch control so no joystick is required, and it allows the user to be able to create the right balance between control and game playing. Another feature of Bulu Monster is the online shop. The shop allows users of Bulu Monster to access special purchase items and discounts as well as reading feedback from on other users and engaging with other competitors on the online forum.

name: Finger Maniac
description:
How fast are your fingers?? Just how fast can you type the alphabet?

Over 40 levels of finger typing fun! Can you type out all the words within the given time? Watch out as the words get tougher and longer as you move up the levels! Again, be accurate!!

name: Peace Park
description: Peace Park - the game that challenges players to restore peace in a communal park, by understanding visitors' interests and making wise decisions

name: TapTapBadger
description:
Be a Hero! use the unique powers of your fingers to tap away the mean badgers and save the world from the evil psy-Badgerinator!
Grow precise reflexes and powerful concentration skills like no others and prove it to all on the leaderboards.

name: Neeko: Your 3D Interactive Monster
description:
Have you ever wanted to own a monster? This is your chance.
Meet Neeko, the cutest and friendliest little monster. Tap and tickle him, make him laugh and help him on his mission to get rid of pesky bugs. If you succeed, you'll also get to know his friends - Meeko, Peeko, Jeeko, Teeko, and Chreesmo.
Neeko is a curious creature. Short-legged, large-eyed, with rubbery hair—and impossibly cute. He likes to dance, play and have fun all day long.
But he faces a challenge that only you can help him with. Annoying and irritating bugs came to Neeko's town and he's not happy about it. He needs your curiosity and fast fingers to help him get rid of all the troublemakers. When you catch enough bugs, you can play a color-matching mini-game, earn coins and unlock four of his cute monster friends: Meeko, Peeko, Jeeko, Teeko, and Chreesmo. Each of them has its own behavior, laughter, sounds and difficulty.
Neeko was designed specially for kids—with much attention going to details, colors, sounds and monster personas. This is a perfect app for your toddler or a preschooler.
However, the game is suitable for all skill levels and ages. Gradual learning curve will take you from a beginner to a master at your own pace. Built-in tutorials will help you get to know Neeko and teach you how to interact with him.
No matter what your age, you'll find hours of fun with this amazing 3D game.

name: Just Touch The WhiteBox!!!
description:
You Don't Know This is Easy Before Playing.
Just Try! and Just Touch The WhiteBox!!

name: Swing 2 Heli
description:
Tap to change direction and swing the 2 heli,don't touch metal pieces.
Play with your friend at the same time on the same device!
Sick and tired of not being able to play swing helicopter with your friends at the exact same time on the same device? Then worry no more !

name: Squarez: Escape The Squares
description: Don’t touch a square. Click around your screen and the ball will move.

name: Tomb Slider
description:
Escape dozens of ancient tombs in this brain-busting puzzle game! Clear the path between the hero and the exit with a few swipes of your finger and enjoy eye-popping artwork that jumps off your mobile screen.
Using your keen intellect to figure out how to move the rocks that block the exit, help an Incan warrior escape hundreds of cleverly designed levels on his quest to reach the surface. The journey might not be easy, but it will be supremely satisfying! Whether you enjoy mind-melting challenges or an easy, breezy experience, Tomb Slider will provide hours of fun and addictive gameplay, so start the adventure today!

name: Two Neons One Brain
description:
Human can't do two things at the same time.
Can you control two flappy neons at the same time?
But, you have only one brain.
Tap the left part of the phone to control the left flappy neon.
Tap the right part of the phone to control the right flappy neon.
The obstacles are changing every time.

name: Profiler: The Hopscotch Killer - Extended Edition
description:
Examine the crime scenes, find clues and discover the serial killer identity. Will you be able to find him on time?
Miss Smith will soon be replacing Deckard, a police officer who is retiring. He will still be here a few days, to show her the ropes. And they won’t be resting: several cases are waiting for them. Obviously, it is more about murders than accidents or suicides… The murderer seems to be following a precise pattern… Miss Black and Deckard will have to investigate to discover who the serial killer is and prevent him from killing someone else.
Help them investigating and observe carefully the crime scenes: time is against you!

name: 2048 Game With New Levels
description: Merge two numbers to go to next level and merge again to go to next highest level and the target will be 2048 and also you can change the target by going to settings.

name: Clue Kaguya-sama: Love is War
description: Clue style game inspired by the anime Kaguya-sama Love is War.

name: Mojito the Cat: Platina Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Project
description: Uncover the heroines' stories, solve puzzles, and immerse yourself in the beauty of anime images.

name: My Nonogram Waifu: Forbidden Love
description: Sin descripción

name: Word Dungeons
description: Word Dungeons borrows attitude from dark and gritty RPGs, and adds these elements to a word game. Solve words, collect loot, power up your runes and discover the mysteries that lay within the dungeon. Can you escape?

name: Space Interceptor
description:
Space Interceptor is an Asteroids tpye of game where you have to avoid not only asteroids but also aliens.

'Space Interceptor: Deluxe Edition' is the name for the registered version, which unlocks more levels and enemies.

name: Super Concentration
description:
Super Concentration is a memory game in which the player has to match pairs of cards in order to clear the deck and win the game.

The shareware version only includes level 1 and 2, the registered version unlocks the rest of the game.

name: Mix Superstar
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreaming in the Mountains
description: A dream and a question The game tells the story of a climber who enters a dream The player, as an abstract subject in the dream, experiences various dream slices hope you get something out of this

name: Gnostic: Survivors
description: Gnostic: Survivors is a survivor style 3rd person co-op game where you pick your weapon, level up to unlock legendary upgrades and survive the never ending horde of enemies.

name: Horror Ken
description:
High difficulty horror action game
Game commentary OK！

name: Merge War: Super Legion Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Beat the Beat!
description: Sin descripción

name: Strangers Awaken
description: Sin descripción

name: Sword Chronicles: Awaken
description: An mobile RPG of another story using the famous individuals from the Three Kingdoms era.

name: Room 817
description: Welcome to one of the scariest old-school horror games. Here, you're not the predator, but the prey. Any mistake will cost you your life. Hide, solve puzzles, explore, and embrace the inevitable terror. The Ancient horror lurks, awaiting you. Based on true events.

name: Racing Go
description: Sin descripción

name: Criminal Case: The Conspiracy
description: Join the Police of Grimsborough once again to solve a series of murder cases in this captivating hidden object, adventure game. Investigate crime scenes for clues, bring the suspects in for questioning and analyze evidence to catch the killers. Are you ready to prove your detective skills?

name: Taxi Sim 2016
description: Sin descripción

name: Criminal Case: Save the World!
description: Sin descripción

name: Newbie Life
description: Sin descripción

name: Criminal Case: Mysteries
description: Sin descripción

name: Bowling by Jason Belmonte
description: An online player vs player mobile bowling game.

name: Ryceam
description: Sin descripción

name: Criminal Case: Travel in Time
description: Travel in Time is the title of the sixth season of Criminal Case. It was released on March 14th, 2019.

name: Nemesis
description: The North American version of Nemesis features a considerably increased difficulty compared to the Japanese and European version. To balance this, the game spawns a fleet of orange enemies when the player loses a life to provide as many power-up capsules as possible to recover as many upgrades as possible. Also the North American version presents a continue feature (but only for three times). The title screen was also updated, showing an in-game reproduction of the promotional artwork behind the logo.

name: Nemesis
description: This version changed similar to the Famicom version but adds its slew of exclusive content to make up for the downgrade. A new stage, the bone planet was added between the Inverted Volcano stage and the Antennoid stage, featuring exclusive enemy types. There also four hidden warp zones and the ability to play as the titular ship from TwinBee if the MSX version of that game is played alongside Nemesis.

name: Nemesis: The Final Challenge
description:
Amstrad CPC port of Gradius.

You are the last hope of the gentle people of Gradius. You've just lifted off to confront the all-out attack of the amoeboid Bacterions. Your hyper-space fighter is armed with the greatest arsenal in the galaxy. Air-to-surface and double beam laser cannons for incredible firepower. Powerful force fields for protection. Time and space warps for fleeing the dimension. You'll need it all just to survive. Because at the heart of the Bacterion Empire lies the Xaerous Superfortress - the nerve center of the all-knowing, all-seeing Bacterion Bio-Computer. It's a duel to the death, while the entire galaxy watches, waits, and hopes!

name: Nemesis: The Final Challenge
description: ZX Spectrum port of Gradius.

name: Gradius
description: Commodore 64 port of Gradius.

name: Gradius
description: PC-8801 port of Gradius.

name: Gradius
description: Sharp X1 port of Gradius.

name: Snap Kid's
description: Snap Kid's is a TCG / RPG hybrid that involves photographing monsters.

name: The Paper Parable
description:
Welcome to The Paper Parable. You will play as Mario, and you will not play as Mario. Your choices will matter, and your choices will be meaningless. You will solve the mystery of Princess Peach's disappearance, and you will be forever left in the dark.

The Paper Parable is a fully custom remix of The Stanley Parable, with more than a double-handful of fully unique endings. Knowledge of The Stanley Parable is not necessary for playing this game.

name: Conquering Everest
description: Conquering Everest is a managerial game where you have to manage a team of people and control the movements of supplies and equipment to reach Camp 6 from Camp 0, before making a push to the summit of the highest mountain in the world, Mount Everest over a number of days. Your team consists of a number of climbers, sherpas and porters, with equipment, tents, food and oxygen needed to be taken to the various camps on route. On day one you are presented with a weather report and four options which are Carry, Move, Route and Summit.

name: Adventures With Oslo: World of Water
description:
Adventures with Oslo: World of Water is the follow-up to Adventures with Oslo: Tools and Gadgets and covers information about water. In comparison to its predecessor, the game features less, but more involved sections:

Winston and the Great Water Cycle Story: This is a linear novel which tells the story of Winston, the water molecule. Within the text are multiple icons which lead to supplemental scientific information, animations and videos.

Oslo's Coloring Book:A drawing program which can be used for own creations or coloring included pictures.

Oslo's WaterWorks BoardGame: A virtual board game. First the player chooses the aggregate phase of the playing stone which means either 0, 1 or 2 advances on the board. The second step is clicking the spinning button which gives two randomly generated numbers: one of them can be chosen and the number is added to the number of moves which are executed afterwards. Depending on the field the player lands on, special effects may take place: receiving clams or having the aggregate phase locked for the next move. The goal is to collect as many clamps before the first player reaches the end of the road.

In addition there are a few short animations which can be triggered in the main menu.

name: The Fall of Rome
description: The Fall of Rome is a strategy game set in 395 BC where the Roman Empire was starting to lose it's grip from Barbarians and armies around Europe, the Middle East and North Africa. You have the chance to save the Empire by fighting off attacks or attacking your enemies around your various provinces over 12 turns. Each turn represents five years and is split into three phases, Income and Expenditure, Movement and finally Combat.

name: Froglet
description: Froglet is a 1-player Frogger clone. The player controls a frog that moves in cardinal directions, trying to cross two busy highways with cars traveling in opposite directions. The roads are separated by a river with moving lily pads that the frog must hop across. There are six homes at the top of the screen that the player tries to position their frog into. The player starts with five lives, and the game restarts if all are used.

name: H2O: High speed Boat Racing
description:
Get ready to race the waves in H2O, a thrilling new genre of watercraft racing games! Immerse yourself in the realistic, high-speed world of aquatic racing, complete with meticulously designed physics and dynamics to simulate the real-life feel of water navigation.

Jump into your virtual watercraft and feel the adrenaline rush as you zoom across lakes, rivers, oceans, and even fantastical settings like futuristic water cities. Whether you're a fan of boats, jet skis, or other aquatic vehicles, H2O has something for everyone.

Join the exhilarating world of H2O today. Embrace the thrill of high-speed racing combined with the unique challenges of water navigation.

It's time to make a splash with H2O: High-Speed Water Racing Game!!

name: Amanda Stories
description: Amanda Stories was the one of the very first "point-and-click" programs for kids. Not only is there a strong narrative--in ten separate stories Inigo explores his house, his dream, the outside world, and Your Faithful Camel ventures as far afield as the North Pole--but where you click actually determines the course of the story. As children (ages 3 and up) move intuitively through one adventure after another, the combination of color animations, great sound effects, original music, and a variety of endings challenges and delights them.

name: Island Casino
description: Check-in to the El San Juan Hotel and Casino and hit the tables for 25 of the world's most popular casino games! Or learn to play with step-by-step, easy-to-understand instruction. Brilliant graphics and sophisticated gameplay put you right in the center of the non-stop casino action, and let you feel the thrill of hitting it big with the most complete and authentic gambling experience available on CD-ROM. It's your Virtual Vacation- and it's only a mouse-click away- Island Casino!

name: Crash Team Racing: Retro-Fueled
description:
Enjoy the original CTR from 1999 with Blue Fire, U-Turning and every turbo pad being USF!

Crash Team Racing: Retro-Fueled is a mod that brings mechanics from Crash Team Racing: Nitro-Fueled back into the original PlayStation game.

name: Evocation: Beyond the Dream
description: In this adventure game the player controls the magician trainee Eto who is sick of the training methods of his master Pan. So he secretly studies in his master's library and challenges Pan to a duel which Eto surprisingly wins. But his victory doesn't last long. After waking up one morning Eto finds himself on a small island which only contains two doors and a small marble ball. Behind the doors are the scenarios of the game, the first leads into the house of an astronomer interested in Far Eastern mysticism. The controls are simple: With the mouse the player moves through the rendered backgrounds. When taking a object he drag & drops the item into his inventory, visa versa for using a item in the game world. The puzzles are logic based riddles similar to Myst.

developers.name: NAVIGO Multimedia GmbH & Co. Produktions KG

name: Evocation 2: The Dream
description: "There are two sides to go" the teacher said - "I know the right way for your thoughts." This adventure has hundreds of items and dozens of locations made with 3D modeling techniques, 22/44 kHz soundtrack, sound effects, text and instructions. An adventure through the centuries, the discovery of an enchanted world, the secret keys of a dream.

name: Untitled Metro Game
description:
Per 4A Games, the developers behind the Metro series, they have already started work on the next Metro game. "Using everything we’ve learned from the last 15 years, we’ve set our sights even higher – the next title is being built for Gen 9 consoles and PC, with a complete overhaul of our engine and renderer to take advantage of the new power, storage, and hardware supported ray tracing afforded by the new consoles."

"We’re committed to delivering a great story driven single player experience; this is what the Metro series is founded on. As a studio, we want to constantly push ourselves to create bigger and better games, but we also listen to what the fans are saying, and we know what’s important to you. We take our responsibility to the franchise seriously, and we think you’ll be excited about our plans for the next chapter."

4A also has elaborated that they intend to explore multiplayer efforts with future Metro games, but are unsure if the next Metro game will launch with a multiplayer experience, or if these efforts will instead manifest as an independent entry in the future.

name: Pokémon Stadium Fusion
description: A mod that implements fusions for every 1st gen pokemon

name: Valiant Rooster
description: Valiant Rooster is a JRPG wich follows the journey of a rooster, Gianni Matragrano, search of his father, going through different dangers and obstacles and discovering horizons that he had not dared to explore before.

name: Ghostrunner II: Brutal Edition
description:
Ghostrunner II is a hardcore FPP slasher set in a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world. Featuring everything fans loved about Ghostrunner plus incredible boss fights, new interactive story, thrilling motorbike levels, improved skills, and more cyber ninja action.

Ghostrunner 2 Brutal Edition Includes:
- Ghostrunner 2 Game
- Ahriman's Katana Sword and Hand Skin
- Modern Energy Sword and Hand Skin
- Molten Blade Sword and Hand Skin
- Gothic Blue Sword and Hand Skin
- Hand Hologram with Username
- Aqua Animated Sword and Hand Skin
- Design 24A Motorcycle Skin
- Ghostrunner 2 Season Pass

name: Ghostrunner II: Deluxe Edition
description:
Ghostrunner II is a hardcore FPP slasher set in a post-apocalyptic, cyberpunk world. Featuring everything fans loved about Ghostrunner plus incredible boss fights, new interactive story, thrilling motorbike levels, improved skills, and more cyber ninja action.

Ghostrunner II Deluxe Edition Includes:
- Ghostrunner II Base Game
- Ahriman's Katana Sword and Skin
- Modern Energy Sword and Hand Skin
- Molten Blade Sword and Hand Skin
- Gothic Blue Sword and Hand Skin
- Hand Hologram with Username

name: Os Trapalhões apresentam Didi na Mina Encantada!
description: Regional re-release of Pick Axe Pete based on Didi Mocó, one of the characters of the Brazilian comedy group, Os Trapalhões.

name: The Incredible Coneman
description: The Incredible Coneman is a maze chase game developed by Lars Barstad and Per Ivar Pedersen unique for its 3d graphics, its death sound, and the three-second bass melody that loops infinitely. It was originally featured in issue 32 of the PSX 'Exclusive Demos' series and made using the Net Yaroze development kit.

name: Star of Providence
description:
Star of Providence is a consolidated version of Monolith that integrates the DLC, Relics of the Past, into the base game.

Star of Providence is a top down action shooter with procedurally generated elements. Explore a progression of floors as you make your way into the depths of the facility, encountering increasingly deadly enemies, fantastic weapons, upgrades, choices and revelations as you venture deeper towards a great and calamitous power.

name: Chilled Chicken
description: A map made by 8 ppl thru discord. 500 monsters on UV but really it sounds longer than it is - you can probably bang it out in a half hour.

name: Forbidden Quake OST Liner Notes
description: Break into a secret, mysterious Zenimax storage facility and retrieve American McGee's and John Carmack's memories of the Quake soundtrack! They might be corporate property, but Doomguy finds a way... ﻿

name: Doggy
description: Off-beat hell levels with lots of heavy weapons usage and Spidey vs Cybie showdowns

name: Testing Pool
description:
A gothic cell with positive gameplay. You can fire the rocket launcher at stuff and pick your own route through the level.
Completionists can visit an optional extra fight which is a little tougher than the rest of the map.

Built with Eternity 4.2 in mind; If you use Eternity you get MOD music and extra text if you leave via the secret exit. but the map itself is perfectly Boom compatible.

name: The Ledge
description: Created for Doom 2, any limit removing port will do. No additional resources required, as this map (Map 20) intends to make the most of Doom 2's stock resources to create its aesthetic.

name: Jägermörder 2: Terra Nova
description: Jägermörder 2: Terra Nova is a single-level PWAD created by Derek MacDonald (Afterglow). It uses an unnamed music track by Jeremy Doyle from Requiem MAP15 and is the sequel to Jägermörder 1: Chemical Lab.

name: Demonic Libido
description: This is the first map I've ever released, it's a straight-forward blowthrough, not too difficult and it offers around 15 to 20 minutes of gameplay...maybe less for skilled players.

name: The Beginning of the End (part 1)
description: The Beginning of the End (part 1) is a two-episode PWAD for Doom. It was created by Emil Brundage (NaturalTvventy) in 1997.

name: Little Lamb
description:
You find yourself in the middle of a forest talking to someone you don't know?
A story reminiscent of Little Red Riding Hood although something has gone horribly wrong...

name: Hopscotch
description: Hopscotch contains twenty mini-maps, each containing a small platforming/puzzle challenge.

name: Shades of Azure
description: This is a mapset with the following traits/gimmicks/whatever; All map titles are one word and end on the letter T, except for MAP32. The maps are primarily coated in blue, using textures from 32in24-15tex & OTEX. Some maps might have a semi-speedmap feel to them, with sparse detailing. Some maps are easy, some are hard; but all except two of them can be knocked out in less than 15-20 minutes.

name: Dawn of the Dead
description: Dawn of the Dead is an episode replacement for Doom created by Jan Van der Veken in June 1997, and was the first PWAD released by the author. It replaces the first episode, though E1M5 is considered by many to be missing, with the slot occupied by a map with one tiny room containing no monsters.

name: The Darkening: Episode 1
description: The Darkening Episode 1: The Nameless Project is a Doom II megawad containing twenty-two maps, split equally between single player/coop and deathmatch.

name: The Darkening: Episode 2
description: The Darkening Episode 2 is the 2000 sequel to 1998's The Darkening. This new episode features twenty-four levels split equally between single player and deathmatch modes. It was initially released on March 8, 2000 with a soundtrack primarily composed by Peter Tomaselli (Kniggit).

name: Tarnsman's Projectile Hell
description: Tarnsman's Projectile Hell, also known as TPH 12.3: Part 1A - The Prequel to Part B Galaxy's Brink!! The Super Incredible Bulgarian Necromancer of the East!! Fight for the Combined Justice of the Planet Sphere - Earth!! is a four episode megawad released in May 2021 by Richard Frei (Tarnsman). The mod is split between four episodes set in a wide variety of locales, and includes a completely overhauled arsenal, many new enemies, and several modifications to already existing ones.

name: Project: Kate
description: Project: Kate is a three-level PK3 for GZDoom by James Paddock. The wad is a tribute to fallen Doom community member Kate Fox, who was a close friend of Jimmy's. The first two levels are birthday gift maps by Jimmy for Kate, while the third was made after her passing in tribute, originally for Abyssal Speedmapping Session 32 and revised for this PK3.

name: Suitcase of Gor
description: Suitcase of Gor is a megawad built for Doom II and Boom-compatible source ports, created by Richard Frei (Tarnsman). It is a collection of the first maps Tarnsman ever made, largely inspired by their Doom II originals (and sharing the same names) but also consisting of other influences, and with a new soundtrack. The project was originally titled Doom II Redux, and a demo was released in 2011, which received an honorable mention at the 2011 Cacowards. The last version of Suitcase of Gor released was in 2013, containing 22 maps, with the full 32-map version never materializing.

name: Balance Balls
description: Use the right and left arrows to balance the red ball. How long can you survive?

name: Goodwad
description: GOODWAD is a MBF21-compatible megawad by Emma Essex (msx2plus). It is a compilation of speedmaps of various types, including slaughter maps, platforming maps, joke maps, and more experimental pieces.

name: The Mountaineer
description: The Mountaineer is a set of 5 MBF21 (-complevel 21) maps depicting a journey to the top of an uncharted mountain. A gift to MIDI connoisseur and good friend @Jimmy, commemorating his 31st birthday.

name: Ad Mortem
description: ''Ad Mortem'' (It means "Forward to Death" in Latin) it's a MBF21 - Halloween-themed community project organized and made by anonymous users from 4chan's Retro Games board. This mapset contains 27 playable maps (24 "Single player" maps, 3 Secret maps and Deathmatch support [MAP05, MAP07, MAP08]) uses a great variety of custom textures that matches the spooky environment (includes GothicTX, OTEX textures and others. read the .txt file for more info.) This community project contains New reskinned weapons, Graphics and 7 new custom enemies. Grab your SMG and let's celebrate this spooky month slaughtering some skelli-bois and ghouls!

name: Balance Balls 2
description: Balance the red ball for as long as you can. Now with power-ups!

name: RPG Workshop Max 2
description: This is an updated version of RPG Max that includes a folder with over 25 great clipart images - including heros, backgrounds, friends and foes. The battle graphics have been improved, along with a cleaner layout, and several bugs have been fixed from previous versions. This is still novelty software, though, and probably could not be used to create a commercial game. This should be used as a practice tool for those starting off in game programming.

name: Phantom Kingdom: Portable
description: Phantom Kingdom: Portable is an enhanced port of Makai Kingdom that was released on the PSP in Japan on October 11th, 2011. The port of the game includes a new character, Petta, along with a new scenario titled "Papa is the Strongest Overlord in the Universe".

name: Super Crazy Guitar Maniac Deluxe
description:
A guitar rhythm game to test your skill and timing, with some great music by Newgrounds artists.

Made for the Flash Portal Game Contest #1.

name: Super Crazy Guitar Maniac Deluxe 2
description: Rhythm game featuring 14 songs from the Newgrounds Audio Portal, 6 guitars and a crazy stickman!

name: DoDonPachi DaiOuJou: Black Label
description: Sin descripción

name: The Legend of Peks
description: The Legend of Peks is a game made using RPG maker MZ in under 100 hours. For the streamer IHasPeks.

name: Fi-Knight Kingdom
description: Challenge your friends in this Local Multiplayer RPG Board Game hybrid. Choose a starting class that fits your playstyle. Encounter lots of enemies, fight strong boss monsters and collect gold to buy powerful dice and pieces of equipment to get the upper hand on your opponents.

name: The Adventures of Sheep and Sheep
description: Yangyang Road Finding Adventure is an adventure puzzle solving casual game.

name: Myths of Rules
description: This is a text-based adventure puzzle game, where you must struggle to survive in a world filled with ghosts and urban legends. While collecting clues, you'll uncover the truth behind the world and find the way out. The game features a wealth of levels, unconventional rules, and a touch of horror.

name: DomiNoo
description: Unleash your creativity and explore endless possibilities in our immersive sandbox game! Knock down dominos, play with different toys, and customize your world. With multiplayer mode and sharing features, the fun never ends.

name: UFindo
description: Are you ready to find the difference? Then quickly run after the magnifying glass and get ready to spot the differences in an exciting puzzle game!

name: Icarus: Cactus Outpost
description: Whitewater rapids, picturesque archways and sand dunes provide an idyllic setting to build your dream Desert base.

name: Icarus: Holdfast Outpost
description: Choose one of several islands in a large archipelago lake to build your perfect island retreat by (or on) the water.

name: Icarus: Iceholm Outpost
description: High in the mountains, on terraced cliffs or a large flat frozen lake give you a range of altitudes in which to build your perfect winter retreat.

name: Icarus: Tecton Outpost
description: The large oasis, precarious cliffs or near the twin waterfalls gives you an abundance of interesting locations to build your desert refuge on this outpost map.

name: Icarus: Everbark Outpost
description: A Waterfall, underwater caves and a picturesque lake are the highlights of this lush forest environment to build your dream base surrounded by nature.

name: Bounce Shot
description:
Bounce Shot is the family-friendly version of the popular college game!

Players take turns attempting to throw ping pong balls into their opponent’s cups, making them disappear. The first player or team to remove all their opponent’s cups wins.

But there’s a twist…

Bounce shots can remove two cups in one go, but also allow the defending player the chance to swat the ball away.

From the same folks who brought you the critically-acclaimed, Eleven Table Tennis, this game is simple to learn but deceptively challenging to master. Use the motion controllers to adjust the speed and angle of your throw to outthink and bluff your opponent.

And trust us on this one… that delicious chime in your brain when you sink a perfect arcing shot into an opponent’s cup never gets old.

Bounce Shot is a game suitable for all ages and skill levels, even those who are brand-new to VR. Want your grandparents (or your grandchildren) to have their first crack at virtual reality? This is the perfect game to introduce them to the experience.

name: Thy Dungeonman 1 & 2 for Playdate
description: A port of Thy Dungeonman from flash to the Playdate

name: Dangerous Ivan
description:
Action-arcade with adventures, zombie, vodka, bear and other cool stuff. Join, comrade!
Be fast and smart - defeat your enemies in two dangerous game modes.

name: Arrow Flick
description:
Just in time for the holidays, Arrow Flick now includes an all-new game mode, Holiday Apocalypse. In it, you take aim at zombies hellbent on, you guessed it, eating your brains.
The good news is that you are armed with an infinite number of arrows to survive 50 waves of zombies. Each wave brings more zombies whose aggression and evasiveness grow greater and greater as well.
You aren’t limited to an old-fashioned bow and arrow, either. Holiday items littered throughout the scenario -- presents, stockings, ornaments -- unlock special weapons to combat the dead men (and women) walking. Weapons include bows capable of shooting three arrows at once and arrows that can be rapidly fired or tipped with explosives.

name: Duo Runner 3D
description: Friends, let's run together.

name: FastLane Street Racer
description: FastLane is an amazingly fun game. Tilt to control the car in order to avoid collisions. Collect coins to buy new cars.

name: Rival Gears Racing
description:
Race Head to Head in this unique high speed action racer. Compete alone or as part of a team against others in high stakes leagues and events. Bet big to win big.
Do you have what it takes to beat the best?

Challenge real players in exciting adrenaline fuelled races through busy city streets. Set wagers, race for glory and riches, and become a real high roller.

Choose from a wide range of stunning rides, each with their own classic lines blended with sleek future styling. These are cars like no other.

 Join or create a Pro-Team and play with old friends and make new ones. Get exclusive benefits, help your friends, and work together to become the top team in the world.

name: Extreme Dash
description:
Get ready for the ultimate challenge.
You have been assigned a simple goal: you have to protect the Cube for 60 seconds.
Looks easy right? It's not.
You will have to push your skills to the maximum in order to pass through these extremely fast roads!
Only 1 out of 25 players beat the game... Give it a try!

name: Solar Rally
description:
Touch the screen to cast shadows over leading rally cars and stop them from colliding.
Clouds slowing down your progress? Swipe them away.
Get as many cars to the exits as you can to show off your high score with friends!
Solar Rally is best played on iPad devices.
Take Solar Rally to the next level by downloading the Leap Motion compatible PC version from our website and cast shadows with your hands!

name: Street Fighter V: Dan Hibiki
description: This DLC adds Dan Hibiki as a fighter.

name: Super Crazy Guitar Maniac Deluxe 3
description: The super crazy guitar maniac returns with 14 new songs to master and 10 awesome guitars to choose from!

name: Clannad
description: A port of Clannad for the PlayStation 2 that adds full voice acting.

name: The Paradixion: Laboratory
description: The Paradixion: Laboratory is the second installment in the "The Paradixion" series, created by a solo South Korean developer. It's a point-and-click adventure game with a mysterious atmosphere.

name: Super Crazy Guitar Maniac Deluxe 4
description: The super crazy guitar maniac is back, with over 16 songs, 14 guitars and a whole bunch of achievements to unlock!

name: Ultimate S
description: A large overhaul of Super Smash Bros. Ultimate.

name: Mirum Orbis
description: Mirum Orbis - The Lands of Otium, is a 2D MMORPG created by the french video game studio Askilian Studio. Created since April 2022, the game plunges the hero into a universe full of mysteries and quests. Throughout the adventure, you will discover unforgettable landscapes and memorable dungeons. Dive into the fabulous world of Ereda and become the greatest hero of your own adventure.

name: Kitten Tales
description: Embark on an exciting quest in Kitten Tales, solve puzzles to find your mother in story mode, and challenge up to 10 players in online races and multiplayer challenges. Do you have what it takes to be the bravest cat?

name: Lucky Gem
description: Work with various sprites to collect gems of different colors and shapes, and help the sprites repair their home.

name: Memories Unveiled
description: During this emotional journey, the player will be faced with choices that will affect a father's story and relationship. These choices can bring healing, help Michael find comfort in his memories, or increase his distress by getting lost in nostalgia.

name: Laruaville 2
description: The moon has fallen from the sky and it needs to be fixed! To fix the moon, you need a Scientist and a Manager. And, of course, a big town to build and lots of Match 3 skills. This game includes Match 3 levels as well as some Mahjongs and Solitaires and a cool story.

name: Bounce House
description: Knock the others off!

name: Escape from the Collector
description: In "Escape from the Collector", you will be trapped in an old house full of puzzles and secrets. Explore its rooms searching clues that will guide your adventure. Each puzzle solved brings you closer to freedom or dooms you to be trapped in the Collector's sinister game. Will you be able to escape?

name: Clannad Full Voice
description: A port of PlayStation 2's Clannad for the PC which imports the full voice acting from it and adds supplementary graphics and higher-definition options,

name: Sleembo
description: Help Bo wake up! Control ragdoll physics in freefall, collect fragments, avoid obstacles from her subconscious, and open the awakening portals. Unique biomes, mini-games, beautiful music, and the magical dream atmosphere await you!

name: Finger Football: Goal in One + Two
description: Take aim and shoot and these two great finger football games!

name: Clannad
description: From the world renowned visual novel studio Key, the highly rated story of CLANNAD is now available on Steam! Improved visuals, achievement integration, and Dangopedia make this the best version of CLANNAD to date.

name: Clannad
description: A port for Clannad for consoles and portable devices developed by PROTOTYPE, in which the game is presented in 16:9 resolution and contains 5.1 surround sound in some releases.

name: Etherena Beta
description: Sin descripción

name: Ghouls 'n Ghosts
description: Ghouls 'n Ghosts, known as Daimakaimura is a side-scrolling platform game developed by Capcom, released as an arcade video game in 1988 and ported to home platforms. It is the sequel to Ghosts 'n Goblins.

name: Ghouls 'n Ghosts
description: Amstrad CPC port of Ghouls 'n Ghosts.

name: Crea Run!
description: Run, jump, and gather building blocks...Craft vehicles using the collected blocks and recipes!An action game of running, jumping, and crafting.

name: Food Fighter Clicker Games
description: Food Fighter Clicker is a clicker game to become the best food fighter in the world by eating fast food and improving your skills. Tap Tap and be the fastest clicker in the world!

name: React-O-Matic
description: Dominate your favorite games with better reaction times! React-O-Matic training forces your brain to adapt to stimuli that are much faster than what you'd normally encounter in a real-world setting. Getting comfortable with extremely fast stimulation will make your average reaction times faster!

name: Ghouls 'n Ghosts
description: Sin descripción

name: Michael Jackson's Moonwalker
description:
Michael Jackson's Moonwalker involves the player controlling the pop star in a quest to save all the kids that have been kidnapped by Mr. Big.

The gameplay is focused on finding children, who are scattered throughout the levels, some behind objects such as doors.

The game's levels and music were borrowed from the 1988 Michael Jackson film "Moonwalker" (though many of the music tracks were taken from Jackson's Thriller album as well) and the player has the ability to destroy enemies by making them dance.

name: Abduction!
description: Sin descripción

name: Transmorpher
description: Sin descripción

name: Hot Wheels: Barbie Dream Camper
description: Don't be fooled by its appearance: the Barbie Dream Camper isn't your classic Sunday driver vehicle. Born for the outdoors, this compact and multifunctional RV will surprise you even on the longest indoor races. And if someone needs a vacation, it will be your rivals, after you overtake them on the finish line!

name: Titan Arum
description:
