An eldritch romance horror visual novel created for the Velox Fabula 2023 Jam.

After years of being a ghost writer on the road, you get the opportunity to finally tell your own story. When your plans change unexpectedly, you end up moving into your family's recently bought home while they're away on vacation. Through chance encounters with people from your past, present, and a potential future interest, you explore the most pressing story you've ever told: your own.

name: Planetfall
description: Planetfall is a sci-fi business trading game where the players command their own merchant fleet. They can travel between the different planetary systems (with changing business conditions), buy and sell any of the six available resources (uranium, iron ore, machinery, medical supplies, computers, and gems), make money and make deposits in banks. A game can have a maximum of 15 star systems.

name: Archaeology
description: Small strategy game created for GMTK GameJam 2023 in 48 hours. Take a role of an archeologist, but instead of digging treasures you put them back into the ground for others to find.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description:
Wolfenstein 3D is a first-person shooter presented with rudimentary 3D graphics and a follow-up to the top-down infiltration game Castle Wolfenstein. The game is broken up into levels, each of which is a flat plane divided into areas and rooms by a grid-based pattern of walls and doors, all of equal height. Each level is themed after Nazi bunkers and buildings. To finish a level, the player must traverse through the area to reach an elevator. Levels are grouped together into named episodes, with the final level focusing on a boss fight with a particularly difficult enemy. While traversing the levels, the player must fight Nazi guards and soldiers, dogs, and other enemies while managing supplies of ammunition and health.

While later releases of the game included the Nocturnal Missions expansion, this initial release did not.

name: Wolfenstein 3D: Nocturnal Missions
description: A prequel expansion containing chapters 4, 5, and 6. This expansion was sold separately for the original release of Wolfenstein 3D, but was bundled into the game for future releases.

name: Strategy 1: Invasion
description: The player is a commander of Western Alliance's forces (blue tanks) and fights against Red's invasion (red tanks, of course). He must defend cities and destroy enemy units. Cities give supplies to increase army's strength. Battlefield has 135 squares (9x15) Player can make 3 types of commands - increase/reduce strength, and move.

name: Strategy II: Hunt For The Bismark
description:
This game is the sequel to Strategy I: Invasion. Your goal is to find the Bismark and make it sink by attacking. The Bismark is invisible till one of your ships is close to it.
You also have aircraft carriers that can launch planes if so desired. The planes can then bombard/shoot the Bismark if it is in their range.

name: The Valley
description: The Valley is a graphical roguelike RPG with a simple interface and semi-real-time combat system. The background story is all but non-existent, suffice to say that you're the hero and you want to explore the name-providing Valley to slay monsters and find treasure.

name: Die drei ???: Fluch des Flaschenteufels
description: Sin descripción

name: Only in Passing
description:
A bite-sized, slice-of-life, indie visual novel with a lo-fi aesthetic. It's all about those brief encounters we have during our daily lives.

The scenarios are randomized. And the visual novel can only be played once.

name: The White Barrows
description: This is a text based game that has elements from a multiple genres dungeon crawl, puzzle, logic challenge, and even resource management. The back story is about a bad wizard who's stolen a magic chalice and you play the plucky adventurer who has to get it back. The bad guy is hiding in the ancient burial grounds, or barrows. The game is based on a map of the barrows in which there are 40 or so rooms. You are dropped randomly into a room. In other rooms are gnomes, trolls, dragons etc and in one room is the wizard. The game is played by moving from room to room exploring. You may view connecting rooms. You may raise a magic wall in an adjacent room. However you have only 400 magic points and viewing or raising a wall costs points so it's important to find the wizard before points run out. The game is a text game. There is only one graphic which is the map that shows how the rooms are connected.

name: TRAZ
description:
TRAZ (Transformable Arcade Zone) is a block breaker game with multiple paddles and 64 levels. There is also a built-in level construction set.

Each level can have different set of paddles - sometimes one at the bottom and one at the top, sometimes one left and one at the bottom, sometimes three stacked-up etc. This gives each level a distinctly new gameplay.

There are power-ups (question-marks falling out of destroyed blocks), unbreakable blocks, monster generators and glass refractors that change the balls movement angle as it passes through.

After a level is cleared, the player must choose the next level by moving on a 8x8 grid of levels.

name: Goonya Monster: Additional Character (Buster): Alice
description: Additional Character for "Goonya Monster". Purchasing this item adds the following Buster as a character that can be used in gameplay. - Alice (Buster)

name: Anno 1800: National Park Pack
description: Allow your residents to take a break from their busy city life by creating stunning parks and lakes with over 20 new ornaments and systems.

name: Endzone 2
description: Endzone 2 is a post-apocalyptic survival colony builder, where you embark to secure humanities survival after a cataclysmic disaster. Discover and repopulate the last habitable grounds, while the survival of your people hinges on your wits, foresight, and resilience in a harsh and unforgiving world.

name: Little Nightmares III
description:
Embark on a new adventure in the unique world of Little Nightmares.

In Little Nightmares III, you follow the journey of Low & Alone, as they search for a path that could lead them out of the Nowhere.

Trapped within the Spiral, a cluster of disturbing places, the two friends will have to work together to survive in a dangerous world full of delusions and escape the grasp of an even greater threat lurking in the shadows.

For the first time in the franchise, face your childhood fears together with a friend using online co-op, or solo with an AI companion.

name: Killing Floor III
description: It's 2091. Megacorporation Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monstrosities called "Zeds." Now, only the rebel group Nightfall stands between these infernal creations and the future of humanity.

name: Destiny 2: Lightfall - Season of the Witch
description: To pursue the Witness, Eris Morn must turn to the magic of the Hive and accept a deal that Savathûn crafted before her death. To honor our end of the bargain, Guardians must become masters of the arcane and harness the power required to defeat a god.

name: Sonic Frontiers: The Final Horizon
description: Rewrite your destiny in The Final Horizon Update! Experience a new story, new playable characters, new challenges, and more in Sonic Frontier’s 3rd climactic final Content Update… for Free!

name: Expeditions: A MudRunner Game
description: Embark on scientific expeditions with this new off-road adventure from the creators of MudRunner and SnowRunner. Lead research missions as you drive a variety of all-terrain vehicles, using high-tech tools and managing your camp and crew to ensure your success in the wild.

name: Destiny Star Girlfriend
description: The Steam version of Destiny Star Girlfriend with its sexual content removed.

name: Diablo IV: Season of Blood
description: Endless demons to slaughter. Deep customization through Talents, Skill Points, Runes, and Legendary loot. Randomized dungeons contained in a dynamic open world. Survive and conquer darkness—or succumb to the shadows.

name: Half-Life 2 RTX
description: Re-live the groundbreaking, critically acclaimed Half-Life 2 like never before, reimagined with RTX Remix. Featuring full ray tracing, remastered assets, and DLSS 3.5 with Ray Reconstruction in this free DLC for Half-Life 2 owners.

name: Thank Goodness You're Here!
description: Thank Goodness You're Here! is an absurd comedy slapformer set in the bizarre Northern English town of Barnsworth. As a traveling salesman, take the time to see the sights and meet the locals, who are very eager to give you a series of increasingly odd jobs…

name: Minecraft: Disney - Worlds of Adventure
description: Step into the magic of six classic Disney tales with this unique map. Explore the world of Aladdin and the sea of The Little Mermaid. Help Snow White, or take a trip with Alice in Wonderland. You can even meet Simba in the savanna, or dine with Belle and the Beast in their castle!

name: Resident Evil 4 HD Project
description: Resident Evil 4 HD Project is a mod for the Steam version of the survival horror video game Resident Evil 4. Created by a duo of modders, Albert Marin and Cris Morales, its purpose is to update the original remaster to the most thorough level possible and provide a "definitive graphical experience".

name: The Rising
description: Wadazine Master Collection 01: The Rising or shortly WMC01: The Rising is a six-level collaborative mapset for Doom II and the GZDoom source port, created by various members of The Doom Master Wadazine community led by Alexa Jones-Gonzales (Remilia Scarlet), with support from Christian Blair (Endless). It is the first entry in the Wadazine Master Collection series. The project started on March 11, 2021. The first version was released on April 25, 2021. The maps were created with heavy use of Doom 3 textures.

name: Thy Flesh Vored
description: Everyone trembles at the sound of his name. Everyone remembers those distant memories of sleepless nights trying to achieve victory. Countless deaths are forgotten in ancient corners. Rivers of blood overflow to give way to oceans of curse. Your flesh is consumed by sin itself. Trapped in marble fortresses, surrounded by hellish castles, deep in gothic hells and exiled in a world of gore. This is Thy Flesh Vored, a project inspired by the dreaded E4 of Ultimate Doom, and one that is coming for your flesh. Hand it over.

name: Biophilia
description: Worlds of darkness hidden among tech-bases that harbor primordial secrets. Biophilia is an ode to the blackness of the night, to the forests of the ancients, to the forgotten gods and to a life of secrets among the darkness. Where once there was progress, now only the bones of a lost science remain. Tech-bases surrounded by forests, outposts in the middle of the night, caves that hide the eyes of the beast, secret bases lost among the trees, etc. This is Biophilia, the fear, the love... to live in eternal darkness.

name: Heresy
description: Wadazine Master Collection 04: Heresy or shortly WMC04: Heresy is an eight-level collaborative episode WAD for Heretic designed for GZDoom or K8Vavoom source ports in UDMF format created by various members of The Doom Master Wadazine community led by Alexa Jones-Gonzales (Remilia Scarlet) and co-lead Christian Blair (Endless). It is the fourth entry in the Wadazine Master Collection series.

name: Bury My Heart Knee Deep
description: Bury My Heart Knee Deep is a huge, vanilla, E1- style map for Doom II that takes cues from Metroidvania game progression. It's bursting with optional areas, secrets, and potential sequence breaks. You can follow the "intended" path or make your own way through. You can even complete the whole thing without picking up a single key.

name: Absolutely Killed
description: A full episode of short, concept-oriented maps for Ultimate Doom. Beware: Not your traditional Doom WAD.

name: Oops! All Greyboxes!
description: Oops! All Greyboxes! is a fun and quirky community project where we made maps using only prototyping textures. This was meant to help us focus on gameplay and combat encounters using limited resources, while still making maps that looked cool.

name: CPD
description: 32 Maps made in DOOM2 format and intended for limit removing ports. Most maps are small to medium in size and average around 170 monsters. Intended for UV play but other difficulties available.

name: Archi-Tek
description: Archi-TEK (also known as UVOLNIT) is a three level PWAD for Doom II designed for GZDoom created by Roman Suchomel (Romsu89). The WAD utilizes almost entirely stock Doom textures and is known for its lengthy maps and intricate detailing.

name: Old Still Life
description: It contains 11 maps for Doom 2, boom compatible. There are slaughter moments, some basic puzzles and non-linear constructions.

name: Dereliction Derby
description:
Dereliction Derby is a single map release that was a result of being inspired by a number of more modern projects such as Eviternity, Bloodstain, Valiant, and so forth.
The desire was to create a stand-alone release that made some use of these modern stylings, especially by making use of Boom features, to create something that has a constant feel of pressure and higher action, while also being detailed enough to make it seem like a real place rather than the most abstract stylings of a lot of Doom fare.

name: Infested
description: Infested is a seven-level (plus intermissions) PK3 for Doom II, created by ginc. Built for GZDoom, Infested includes custom monsters, weapons and textures. The gameplay also features scripted arena-like encounters where the player must deal with Gore Nests that summon waves of monsters.

name: Terminal
description: An Episode 2 map that's chock-full of laser-saturated, demon-munching action. This level is about 20 minutes long, so a cut version has been provided in the E2M3 slot for people who don't like long maps.

name: Tomb of the Old Lords
description: Tomb of the Old Lords is a challenging map with classic gameplay set in Hell. Sink into the depths of the old tomb and carve through flesh and blood to your freedom. I put an emphasis on both the visuals and the combat design, and this represents the most complicated map I've completed, mechanically speaking (close to 100 unique sector/linedef tags and multi-stage voodoo doll closets for scripts). I chose to work with only vanilla textures to get back to basics and challenge myself on the visual design.

name: Heaven Stroll
description: Demons invaded a bungalow of yours and your friends. Get them out !

name: Happy Birthday, Csonicgo!
description: Has HMP and UV (HMP will be quite a bit more generous if you find UV too oppressive) and Comp level 9.

name: Firebloo Girls
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Magnetic
description:
Black Magnetic is one new level for DooM II with new monsters, textures and weapons.
You may find the gameplay different from the typical Doom one. Monsters are mainly hitscanner with high health so you will have to get cover very often. Explore the installation for better weapons.
It was built for the Doomja-Vu contest started by Tormentor667 on the Realm 667 forum.

name: November 5th
description: This level was orginally created to celebrate Hellbent's birthday in 2015.

name: Put Up Your Dukes!
description: Put Up Your Dukes! is a single-level PWAD for Doom II requiring the GZDoom source port that came out in 2015. It was designed by Sgt. Shivers and uses the music track. Its submission to the Doomjà-Vu contest was awarded with the runner-up spot

name: The Heart of Stone
description: The Heart of Stone is a single-level PK3 for Doom II and the GZDoom source port. It was designed by evil space tomato in 2015 and uses the music track "Coalescence" from Risk of Rain. It reached fourth place in the Doomjà-Vu contest.

name: Pac-Man Doom
description: Pac-Man Doom is a 12-map adventure, where you run around mazes and other exotic locations in search of Pac-Dots. Lots of custom sprites immerse you in a world that is both Doom and Pac-Man at once. The 12 maps span a wide variety of locations: from taking you deep inside a computer mainframe and a haunted mansion, to a lush green hedge maze and a beach resort. Keep running and make sure to take care of those Ghost Pinkies!

name: The 12 Days of Doomas!
description: Snow is falling, reindeer are flying, arch-viles are doing that bubbly gurgle noise thing they do, and the fourth installment of the Pineapple Under the Sea Monthly Speedmapping Series has left a very nice gift under a tree near you! 15 uniquely wrapped 10 sectored gifts are here and waiting for you to rip and tear open this Doommas! Unfortunately for you, there are also 75 arch-viles under the tree. Guess you shouldn't have been such a naughty kid this year, huh.

name: Clandestine Castle Crashing
description: Forsooth! For ye knights of Speed of ye Pineapple Under the Sea hath created yet another bountiful megaWAD secreted with many hidden items for thoust've to explore and gather as ye Crash thee Castles Clandestine!

name: Imperfect Hatred
description: Imperfect Hatred is the sixth edition of PUSS, BluePineapple72's monthly speedmapping series. These maps hate you, and you will love it.

name: Speed Squared
description: Speed Squared is the eighth edition of PUSS, BluePineapple72's (semi) monthly speedmapping series. These maps were built with BigBrik's Adventures of Square total conversion. Download Square here:

name: Duke Nukem 3D
description:
Duke Nukem 3D for Android and iOS is an authorized Duke Nukem 3D port developed by MachineWorks Northwest and published by Tapjoy.
Apart from its unique control scheme, the Android/iOS version is largely unchanged from the PC version, though there is no in-game music outside the main menu.

name: Path of Exile: Trial of the Ancestors
description:
In this expansion, you will visit the Karui afterlife and defeat ten tribes in a series of tournaments to earn valuable new rewards.

Our August expansion introduces the Trial of the Ancestors challenge league, 16 new Atlas keystones, reworks of the Guardian and Chieftain Ascendancy classes, 14 new support gems and the return of a fan-favourite past league, The Forbidden Sanctum.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
description: Duke Nukem 3D for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis is a console port of the desktop PC/MS-DOS game Duke Nukem 3D. The port is profoundly different from the original game.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
description: The Sega Saturn version of Duke Nukem 3D is a 1997 port that was developed by Lobotomy Software and published by Sega. Instead of the classic Build engine, the port uses Lobotomy Software's own game engine, SlaveDriver, which is notable for its use of dynamic lighting.

name: Happy Time Circus
description: Sin descripción

name: Happy Time Circus II
description: Sin descripción

name: Forest Adventure
description: The little girl's favorite handkerchief was taken away by a wolf. In order to get her handkerchief back, the girl who has no fighting ability decided to follow the wolf to the mountain.

name: License to Breed
description: Money, power, fame! The Amane family has it all... Well, except heirs to continue on the family name. Thus the Amane Patriarch has one final command: "Any fertile man in the Amane family must go out and breed at once! It shall be allowed any place, any where in the city. No exceptions."

name: Magnet Mania 3D
description: Magnet Mania 3D, it's a simulation game for small and big engineers, school children to learn about magnetism and physics.

name: Moonlight Sculptor: Darkgamer
description:
Step into the era where the renowned adventurer, Weed, wove his enigmatic and unparalleled legacy. Embark on a journey to conquer the Verisa Continent Pass anew!
A fresh narrative that stays faithful to the essence of the original novel.

name: Train Sim World 4
description: Feel the power of simulation in your hands. Experience immense velocity and express unrivalled creativity with Train Sim World 4! Expand your rail hobby and discover the raw emotion of driving a diverse array of iconic routes and trains. From training center to mountain pass, this is your journey.

name: Competitive Checkers
description: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become a Checkers champion?

name: MechWarrior Online: War Emu Legendary Mech Pack
description: Presenting the Stalker "War Emu" Legendary Mech with unique hard points, quirks, and a 30% C-Bill boost! Playing the Legendary Mech will unlock rewards from the Mini Battle pass which includes unique in-game customization items, in-game currency, boosters, and consumables.

name: MechWarrior Online: Scaleshot Legendary Mech Pack
description: Presenting the Viper "Scaleshot" Legendary Mech with unique hard points, quirks, and a 30% C-Bill boost! Playing the Legendary Mech will unlock rewards from the Mini Battle pass which includes unique in-game customization items, in-game currency, boosters, and consumables.

name: Mystery Solitaire: Grimm's Tales 9
description: Fairytale heroes in a fairytale world! Amazing locations and interesting levels solitaire based on the Grimm brothers fairy tales.

name: Unorthodox Game
description: Sin descripción

name: CircleRun I
description: Venture through space and beware of obstacles along the way.

name: NitroZ
description:
As the coolest mobile racing game, NitroZ is committed to providing the best mobile driving and drifting experience to all players. In order to satisfy your desire for exciting game, we developed the Chasing mode. As a famous street racing car driver, you have already been targeted by polices and you need try to escape from their chasing with you great driving skills.
Not only can you enjoy the racing, you can also join the romantic dance party and make more friends in the game.

name: MiniMow
description:
Master the simple Mow controls to reach the end, using your dexterity and reflexes. Beautiful graphics and excellent music will accompany you on your trip with MOW.
Complete the circuits touring beautiful cities, sunny beaches and inscrutable mountains.

name: Mr. Melk Winter Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Minion Masters: Frost Dragon's Lair
description:
Frost Dragon’s Lair DLC is a great +300% value bundle that gives you what you need to build your own Stoutheart deck, including the legendary Scott the Sensitive Savage! It also gives you a headstart in this month’s Season Pass.

Includes:
- 3x Scott the Sensitive Savage (SaltyBarbarian) (Legendary)
- 5x Mountain Gale (Supreme)
- 20x Log Tosser (HighlandLogger)
- 40x Frostfeathers (Owl)
- 40x Woodsman
- 5x Power Tokens (Get 5 extra random surprises)
- 3x Season Pass Tiers

Stoutheart love to fight almost as much as they love to party. Play two Stoutheart minions close to each other to trigger the Revelry mechanic, and the fun-loving mountain folk will back each other up in various ways! You can even use Mountain Gale to speed up your Stouthearts and gain more Revelry while your Frostfeathers swoop in and slow down your opponents.

name: Musket Smoke
description: Flank and charge with friends! Simple, fun and rich with tactical options. Musket Smoke is a turn-based, war game with an unusually interactive UI allowing for enormous tactical options. Smoke, artillery, cavalry charges, morale and flanking. It’s all here and dead simple to play.

name: Mastery of Fate: Phantom King's Rise
description: Mastery of Fate: Phantom King's Rise is an action adventure that requires timing and precision to defeat powerful foes.

name: Womb
description: During a route next to Prasinos, a colonized little planet, Helena received the a order to investigate a S.O.S. sign streamed by the mothership Z9. When landing on site, she discovers that the situation was much worse than she thought.

name: Kill
description: An experimental Ultimate Doom megawad with 26 maps made in over 25 years.

name: Ruins of Sathryn
description: This is a fairly open map with a desert and ruins theme, offering plenty of chaotic combat and a fairly simple progression.

name: Dark and Forgotten
description: This is a simple, fast WAD with a little higher difficulty than usual, but it shouldn't be too punishing. The environment focuses on darkness, dark tech-bases and a lot of acid.

name: Technical Issues
description: Technical Issues is a large single-level WAD for Doom 2. Using stock textures and the basics, I tried to make a complete level that felt like a progressive adventure, combining various visuals styles and using traditional gameplay.

name: Freaky Panties
description: Freaky Panties is an experimental level that adjusts itself to how well you play. If you're playing well, it will get a bit harder. If you start to die too often, it will scale back the difficulty automatically. Essentially I tried to make the map adjust itself without ever having to set a monster or item to only appear on certain difficulty settings.

name: Freaky Panties 2: Boxers or Briefs
description: Freaky Panties 2: Boxers or Briefs is the spiritual sequel to the original Freaky Panties. Unlike the original, however, FP2 does NOT have a dynamic difficulty system - difficulty is instead handled in a traditional Doom-y way.

name: Freaky Panties IV: Hipsters and Bikinis
description: The difficulty settings in Freaky Panties IV do not behave in the same way as the traditional Doom difficulty settings: the same monsters and items appear regardless of difficulty. Instead other aspects of the game change in order to raise or lower the difficulty. For example, on easy difficulties, the monsters are weaker and less aggressive. A brief description of the difficulty is provided in the menu when you select it.

name: Freaky Panties V: I Love Penguins
description: Freaky Panties V is a map done entirely in Linux using only the Eureka level editor for mapping.

name: Halls of The Goat Child
description: Halls of The Goat Child is a semi-speedmap that is short and sweet, taking me about 12 minutes to complete on UV﻿. It gets to the point and doesn't ﻿do anything ﻿too elaborate.

name: The Unending
description: The Undending is about a guy who just had an unfortunate accident and is now in a sort of repeating personal hell.

name: Tower of Lies
description: There is a tower at the heart of Hell... At the top: the promise of salvation. But you'll first have to climb from its forgotten depths to the throne that overlooks all of Hell -- and defeat the demon prince who rules there.

name: Extreme Terror
description: Demons have once again invaded a UAC military base. Since you seem to be good at stopping such invasions, the UAC has sent you to contain the situation.

name: Tekken 8: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Deluxe Edition Includes:
- Tekken 8
- Playable Character Year 1 Pass
- 4 additional playable characters
- Avatar Skin: Kinjin
• Character Costume: Gold Suit Pack
- 1 costume per each playable character (32 total)

name: Tekken 8: Ultimate Edition
description:
The Ultimate Edition Includes:
- Tekken 8
- Playable Character Year 1 Pass
- 4 additional playable characters
- Avatar Skin: Kinjin
• Character Costume: Gold Suit Pack
- 1 costume per each playable character (32 total)
• Avatar Costume: Classic TEKKEN T-Shirt Set
- 32 designs
• Avatar Skins: Kazuya Mishima, Jin Kazama, and Jun Kazama

name: Tales of Fearless online
description:
Tales of Fearless is a 2D Hardcore Old School MMORPG with Medival and Fantasy style
With pixelated graphics that beats that nostalgia feeling of old games like Tibia, FFIV, and Zelda.
Made by a lover of old 2D games, Tales of Fearless has over 8 years of development.

name: Dragonhold
description: Dragonhold is a multiplayer dragon and melee extraction game. Soar through the air or charge into the melee with a growing lineup of dragons and warriors. Compete head-to-horn with other dragon riders from around the world.

name: Super Clash Bros.
description: Super Clash Bros is a fan-made crossover game with an adventure mode and battle mode. Both modes support up to 4 players. The characters are generally accurate & faithful recreations: same abilities, controls, health systems, inventories, etc. from their games. The levels in adventure mode are remakes from their games too.

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Special Edition
description:
Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Special Edition Content:
• Granblue Fantasy: Relink Game
• Weapon: False Sword of the Apocalypse
• Color Packs 2 and 3
• Starter Item Pack (Glitterstone (S) x30, 500 MSP, Fortitude Crystal (S) x50)
• Granblue Special Item Set: Relink Pack* (includes "Main Character Outfit: Rebelwear" x1 and "Eternals' Transcendence Set or Evokers' Domain Set" for the Granblue Fantasy mobile/browser game)
Additionally, pre-orders include the following benefits:
• Stamina III and Enmity III Sigils*
• Early Access* (planned for January 28, 2024)

* Available only for the PS4/PS5 version.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Mid-Fight Masses
description: Mid-Fight Masses, also called Sarvente's Mid-Fight Masses, is a Friday Night Funkin' mod that adds in two weeks with 5 songs in total, cutscenes, and various other features, such as a remix of the Tutorial. In this mod, Boyfriend and Girlfriend are trying to look for a bathroom, but manage to stumble into a church. In the church, they end up rap battling the "nun", Sarvente.

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Deluxe Edition
description:
Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Deluxe Edition Content:
• Deluxe Edition Box
• Granblue Fantasy: Relink Game
• Starter Item Pack (Glitterstone (S) x30, 500 MSP, Fortitude Crystal (S) x50)
• Character Color Pack 1, 2, and 3
• Weapon: False Sword of the Apocalypse
• Official Artbook
• Soundtrack CD
• Postcard Set

name: Street Fighter V: Gill
description: This DLC adds Gill as a fighter.

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Digital Deluxe Edition Content:
• Granblue Fantasy: Relink Game
• Weapon: False Sword of the Apocalypse
• Color Packs 1, 2 and 3
• Starter Item Pack (Glitterstone (S) x30, 500 MSP, Fortitude Crystal (S) x50)
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack
• Granblue Special Item Set: Relink Pack (includes "Main Character Outfit: Rebelwear" x1 and "Eternals' Transcendence Set or Evokers' Domain Set" for the Granblue Fantasy mobile/browser game)

Additionally, pre-orders include the following benefits:
• Stamina III and Enmity III Sigils
• Early Access (planned for January 28, 2024)

name: Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Collector's Edition
description:
Granblue Fantasy: Relink - Collector's Edition Content:
• Collector’s Edition Box
• Granblue Fantasy: Relink Game
• Starter Item Pack
• Character Color Pack 1, 2, and 3
• Weapon: False Sword of the Apocalypse
• Special Artbook
• Special Soundtrack CD
• Postcard Set
• Metal Charm: Sword of Eos
• Proto Bahamut Statue Figure

name: Magnecord
description: Push yourself farther. Pull yourself together. Master the Spheres. Reach for the heavens. Discover what it means to become a Magnesage in this unforgiving platformer with a unique traversal mechanic that's easy to learn, yet hard to master. Your skills will be tested. Master Caelum awaits.

name: Bust Up
description: Smash stuff down!

name: Vahluna Corp.
description: Confront the alien invaders head-on, but risk dwindling ammo and their sharpshooting abilities, or take the stealthy path, sneaking around, and seeking hidden vents and passageways to outmaneuver his enemies.

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Summer Bundle Part 2
description: Enjoy your last heat vibe of summer with Battle Pass! Start your journey at Lv.15 and enjoy a bonus of 110 Points and other amazing goodies right from the get-go! Incredible rewards await to help you beat the summer heat, so don't miss out!

name: 3on3 FreeStyle: Battle Pass 2023 Summer Part 2
description: Cooling out with splash wave and enjoy the hot weather! It's packed with exciting missions and rewards, including fantastic Hot Summer outfits, 110 Points, and a whole bunch of other in-game goodies!

name: WarWar Battle Kingdom
description: An exciting game that requires you to plan and analyze the situation. Get ready for exciting battles, incredible opportunities and exciting challenges. Become a great warrior and win this exciting battle of the kingdoms!

name: Planetiles
description: Planetiles is a serene city-builder about crafting natural habitats on remote planets. Create a space haven, protect it from natural disasters, and evolve your world while completing challenging quests. Craft unique biomes and unlock exciting bonuses and new tile types.

name: Wild Shot
description: In the age of monsters, you guard the most sexy and beautiful girls in the world, and they determine the fate of mankind. In the face of noble freedom and high-quality genes, do you choose heroic redemption or killing and plundering?

name: Gubbins
description: Gubbins is a friendly puzzle game where you place tiles to construct words, with the help and hindrance from weird little pals called Gubbins. Minimalist typography alongside mischievous cartoons serve as a kooky canvas for moreish wordplay. It’s essentially Solitaire meets Scrabble with hilarious friends wreaking havoc.

name: Train Sim World 4: Deluxe Edition
description: Experience even more velocity and creativity with Train Sim World 4 Deluxe Edition - featuring 4 routes, the chance to drive the most famous locomotive in the world, Flying Scotsman, and haul heavy freight in the iconic Vectron in Railpool livery!

name: Train Sim World 4: Special Edition
description: Have the ultimate Power of Simulation in your hands with Train Sim World 4 Special Edition. Discover the best Train Sim World has to offer with this bumper pack collection featuring no less than 8 routes, the Railpool Vectron and world-famous Flying Scotsman!

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Ultimate Edition
description: Wage a campaign of brutal conquest in this realm-shattering real-time strategy game set in the Warhammer Age of Sigmar universe. Command four unique factions in dynamic battles as part of a story-driven campaign and test your mettle in online multiplayer.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - Deluxe Edition
description: Wage a campaign of brutal conquest in this realm-shattering real-time strategy game set in the Warhammer Age of Sigmar universe. Command four unique factions in dynamic battles as part of a story-driven campaign and test your mettle in online multiplayer.

name: Fae Farm: Deluxe Edition
description: Escape to the magical life of your dreams in Fae Farm. Purchase the Deluxe Edition of Fae Farm.

name: Mellowollem
description: "Mellowollem" is an adventure game where you explore maps and find objects to progress. The main character meets a girl on a sunny summer day, and the story unfolds guided by her words. However, detailed story elements remain undisclosed, leaving only the setting of a hot, dreamy summer landscape.

name: Live In The Country
description: In the world, there are many gods, and you will play one of them as a' mountain god '. You can not only learn how to plant and grow various crops; You can also cook and make delicious dishes;It can also manufacture furniture and decorate the environment.

name: Hoshi no nai Sora no Shita de
description:
A reasoning adventure game where the protagonist, a high school girl who has lost her best friend to murder, searches the school to uncover the culprit.

The objective of the game is to gather information, analyze clues, and identify the perpetrator.
Winner of the "Techwin Contest Park" Bronze Award.

name: Rope & Ball
description: Very easy: throw and take the ball to the goal BE IT AS IT MAY!!

name: Persona 3 Reload: Aigis Edition
description:
Persona 3 Reload - Aigis Edition content:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Artbook
• Soundtrack
• Aigis Figure
• Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack (includes all DLC available at launch)

name: Persona 3 Reload: Limited Box
description:
Persona 3 Reload - Limited Box content:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Artbook
• Soundtrack
• S.E.E.S. uniform armband

name: Persona 3 Reload: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Persona 3 Reload - Digital Deluxe Edition contents:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Digital Artbook
• Digital Soundtrack

name: Persona 3 Reload: Digital Premium Edition
description:
Persona 3 Reload - Digital Deluxe Edition contents:
• Base game
• P4G BGM Set (Pre-Order Bonus)
• Digital Artbook
• Digital Soundtrack
• Persona 3 Reload DLC Pack (includes all DLC available at launch)

name: Rebel Moon
description: A four-player co-op action game tie-in for the upcoming two-part Netflix movie from Zach Snyder. The game will be exclusive to the Netflix games service and more information will be revealed in 2024.

name: Clue/Cluedo
description: Step into new Crime Scenes. Use your skills of deduction to unravel the mystery and find out who did it, with what weapon, where. It's the original crime-solving classic with new investigation formats exclusive to the video game. Solve every case and become the detective you want to be!

name: Clue/Cluedo: Black Adder Resort Bundle
description: Step into new Crime Scenes. Use your skills of deduction to unravel the mystery and find out who did it, with what weapon, where. It's the original crime-solving classic with new investigation formats exclusive to the video game. Solve every case and become the detective you want to be!

name: Fritz: Your Chess Coach
description: Fritz. Your chess trainer! Chess is fun with me! With AI help you learn to play brilliant winning games even as a beginner. Or play at professional level without help. Always with a humorous commentary. I also find opponents for you on the chess server and give you tactics training.

name: Anonymous Messages
description: You are lost in a bizarre looking forest. You can't remember anything… survive your time in the forest and recover some parts of your memory... Beware the Trees are Watching You O_O

name: Broken Sword: Parzival’s Stone
description: George and Nico uncover another ancient mystery to get involved with as series prepares for 6th entry.

name: Broken Sword: Shadow of the Templars Reforged
description: The classic multi-award winning adventure "Broken Sword - the Shadow of the Templars" returns with glorious 4K visuals and iconic remastered audio, pitching intrepid American George Stobbart and fearless journalist Nico Collard into a journey of perilous adventures and ancient conspiracies.

name: Killer Bean Unleashed
description: Killer Bean Unleashed delves into the relentless journey of Killer Bean, a former elite assassin who finds himself at odds with the organization that once employed him. This high-octane action platformer showcases a fusion of classic gameplay dynamics with cutting-edge visuals. As players navigate through 29 challenging levels, they'll encounter a myriad of adversaries from the Shadow Agency. To truly dominate the game, one needs not only skill but also a range of super weapons – from Magnum bullets and Explosive rounds to Beam Splitter Lasers and Fire Bombs. In this adrenaline-pumping quest for vengeance, unique features like triple jumps bring an almost ethereal feel to the experience, while recent updates introduce daily dungeon levels, enhanced aiming assistance, and a range of interactive in-game elements.

name: Hollybound
description: Introducing Hollybound: a game of underqualified heroes! A radioactive invasion is taking over Wayfield, and it's up to you to stop it! In this action-packed top-down shooter, you'll face inconvenient traffic, a crowded shopping mall, and even an Italian restaurant! ...It's cooler than it sounds.

name: TouHou Dew Valley
description: Go on a trip and find a treasure box And Farming! Please combine items or talk to NPCs to solve their difficulties You can meet various bullet hell patterns!

name: Anarchy Park
description: Welcome to Anarchy Park! An Isometric Boss Rush Bullet Hell set in a wacky amusement park! Featuring a 3D environment that will challenge your ability to aim, shoot and dodge simultaneously!

name: Flag Defender!
description: Get ready to defend the flag and prove your strategic prowess!

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Kakuro
description: The royal road of pencil puzzles, this puzzle is extremely fun. In "Kakuro", you break down the totaled numbers given as hints to fill in the spaces. Well. We say "break down the numbers", but in Nikoli's Kakuro very little calculations are actually required, with concentration and the power of deduction being the most necessary attributes.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2 - Necromancer
description: Sienna’s Necromancer career is born from a fight with her twin sister, Sofia, granting her new powers and abilities that allow her to command the dead. How, exactly, these powers were obtained by the once Bright Wizard have yet to be revealed.

name: ZeroSpace
description: ZeroSpace is a cinematic RTS with an epic sci-fi story where your decisions determine the fate of the galaxy. No two matches play the same thanks to nearly limitless combinations of factions, mercenary units and heroes, introducing unparalleled strategic depth and player expression to the genre.

name: Super Mario Maker for Nspire
description: An unofficial Super Mario Maker port for the TI-nSpire calculator.

name: OutRage: Fight Fest
description: OutRage is a 16 player beat-em-up, brawler! Players use punches, kicks, throws, weapons and the destructible levels around them to fight each other in FFA, battle royale or team-based game modes. Do damage, earn rage, rage up, get bigger, hit harder and throw bigger in short, chaotic sessions!

name: Asterix & Obelix: Cesar's Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Menace
description: Lead a strike force against an alien threat in this turn-based tactical RPG from the developers of Battle Brothers. Answer distress calls across different worlds, train and equip infantry, deploy tanks and mechs, and plan and execute missions in detailed turn-based battles.

name: Mario Royale Deluxe
description:
An unofficial remake of Mario Royale.

It was cancelled in favor of in favor of Mario Royale Legacy's development, and so it was made Open Source,

name: Death By Hamster
description: Hamster. In a car. Shooting people.

name: Underlab
description: The spiritual successor to Project Winter, Underlab is a mashup of role-playing and social deception set in a secret deepsea laboratory.

name: Kaizo Mario Galaxy: Rebalanced
description: Kaizo Mario Galaxy: Rebalanced is a big update for Kaizo Mario Galaxy (2018), rebalancing the difficulty curve and adding new boss battles.

name: Neo Mario Galaxy
description: Neo Mario Galaxy is an unofficial modification of Super Mario Galaxy 2

name: Park Beyond: Beyond Extreme
description: In Park Beyond players can create the park of their dreams, without being held back by gravity! As the newly-hired visionary architect for a struggling company, players will be able to create mind-twisting theme parks. Players can create rides they have always dreamt about but that couldn’t exist in real life. Along with Phil, the enthusiastic park veteran and Izzy, the stern but friendly executive and a host of other colorful and passionate characters, players will pave the way to a successful and profitable park company. Thanks to accessible controls and a story-driven campaign mode, players will get to learn the ropes of park management and build increasingly crazy rides and modular coasters.

name: Grime II
description: Become the stealer of forms in GRIME II, a surreal action-adventure metroidvania. launch tendrils made of hands to absorb foes and summon molds in their shape, as you explore a bizarre lived-in-world obsessed with art.

name: Phantom Spark
description: Dive into the captivating high-speed world of Phantom Spark. Engage in precision time-trial racing to best the champions in the single-player campaign, challenge your friends in split-screen local multiplayer, or make your mark on the global online leaderboards.

name: Light Arrow is Missing
description: Light Arrow is Missing (LAIM) are puzzle hacks where the Light Arrow has been hidden some where in the game and cryptic clues have been left behind that lead to it's location.

name: Scribble
description: Using your crayon, draw each picture as fast as you can in connect-the-dot style gaming. Get through all 20 levels to recieve a rank for your artwork! Start at one, hold down the mouse, and work your way up.

name: Hexxen: Hunters
description: Lead a party of 18th century Hunters against the forces of Hell in this turn-based tactical RPG. Manage your base of operations, train your team of Witch Hunters, and fight to save the world from certain doom.

name: Super Mario 64 in Tomb Raider
description: A mod which adds Mario from Super Mario 64 to Tomb Raider (OpenLara).

name: Tormented Souls II
description: Caroline Walker is back in an award-winning classic survival horror sequel. Explore eerie monasteries and other nightmarish locations. Brace yourself, confront terrifying creatures armed only with makeshift weapons as you desperately try to rescue your cursed sister.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.1 Taraimawashi-hen
description: An extra arc exclusive for the console releases of Higurashi When They Cry acts as a bad ending when the player does not make choices that would lead them to Onikakushi, Watanagashi, or Tatarigoroshi.

name: Penrose
description:
"A strange thrumming then, not in the air or ears. Sensed dully in a way that I'd never felt before..."

Penrose is a non-linear narrative by doublespeak games. Scroll forwards and backwards through an ever-changing story. Manipulate the environment, explore every possibility, and unravel the mystery at the heart of everything...

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.2 Onikakushi-hen
description: A remake of the original first chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Duke Nukem 3D
description: Xbox Live Arcade port of Duke Nukem 3D.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.3 Watanagashi-hen
description: A remake of the original second chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.4 Tatarigoroshi-hen
description: A remake of the original third chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.0 Himatsubushi-hen
description: A remake of the original fifth chapter of Higurashi When They Cry.

name: The World's Hardest Game: On Steam
description: I present you The World's Hardest Game... On Steam! An aesthetic take on a classic browser game from 2008. Wait, are you sure you're ready to face The World's Hardest Game again? With aesthetic visuals and enhanced gameplay? Oh, and a revamped soundtrack? Alright. You can try.

name: Project Loro
description:
After years of serving as a support studio for major projects such as Halo Infinite, Doom, and Perfect Dark, Certain Affinity is once again striking out on its own with an original project, codenamed Project Loro.

This news was revealed by company founder and CEO Max Hoberman, who described it as an "original FPS."

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.5 Meakashi-hen
description: A remake of the first arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.6 Tsukiotoshi-hen
description: An extra arc that serves as an alternate version of Tatarigoroshi where Keiichi, Shion, and Rena team up to save Satoko from her uncle.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.7 Tsumihoroboshi-hen
description: A remake of the second arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Ch.8 Minagoroshi-hen
description: A remake of the third arc of Higurashi When They Cry Kai.

name: Rainbow Friends: Hide 'N Seek
description: Zombie monsters are invading the town, spreading deadly infection everywhere they go. To survive the apocalypse, you must be ready to fight.

name: Particles
description: Particles is a simple physics-based flash game where you dodge bouncing balls. Move the blue ball with the mouse, and try to avoid the red balls for as long as you can. As time goes by, more and more balls come up. Keep focused!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Final Chapter - Miotsukushi-hen
description: Meakashi Hen serves as an alternative ending for Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri, since Matsuribayashi is not included.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Kakera Asobi
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri: Kakera Asobi is a standalone expansion for Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Matsuri that includes some content from Matsuribayashi, an improved flowchart, and full voice acting for scenes that were previously unvoiced.

name: Undawn: Desert Fury
description:
In the Desert Fury update, you will get the following:
- New map: Golden Desert
- New story: The Abyss
- New Settlement: Junkyard - Carnival Land for the Owls
- New Roles :Troubadour & Highwayman
- New Events

And much more!

name: Spacecat Simulator
description: Adopt, feed and customize your own virtual pet in Spacecat Simulator! Take care of your space cat, keep it happy and healthy. Play exciting mini-games to earn points, unlock skins and accessories in the shop. Create a unique look for your virtual pet and have even more fun in Spacecat Simulator! Become the best space cat sitter with our pet care simulation game.

name: Age of Empires IV: The Sultans Ascend
description: The Sultans Ascend – the biggest expansion for Age of Empires IV yet! Step into history as you explore new territories, lead powerful armies, and immerse yourself in the rich history of the Middle East.

name: CabbageBall
description:
Cabbageball is a thrilling skill-based competitive handball game that incorporates magical abilities and sports.
Are you ready to test your skills and see if you have what it takes to be the champion?

name: Torch
description: The first game in the HauntedPS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology, it follows a young woman exploring a cave with not but a singular torch. Its case report details a labyrinth of walls and pathways in Utah, first recorded on the 25th of August, 1997.

name: Ms. Blanch,
description: The second game in the HauntedPS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology, it follows the interactions of a Ms. Blanch and a man who attempts to drive her into the ocean.

name: The Participants
description: The third game in the HauntedPS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology, it documents a nightmare-like trawl through a surrealist underwater world.

name: Emerge
description: The fourth link in the C.H.A.I.N. anthology is a mysterious exploration game. Its case report has a mysterious (now dried) liquid on top of a mostly illegible synopsis.

name: Drip
description: The fifth link in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N. anthology is a lovecraftian arcade platformer under the water.

name: Ananta
description: Take on the role of an elite Agent within the A.C.D. (Anti-Chaos Directorate) embarking on an exhilarating adventure through a world that breaks all the rules. Meet a variety of interesting characters, jump into exciting combat, solve challenges and safeguard the balance by overcoming threats to humanity, all while enjoying unparalleled freedom to traverse and discover Nova City on a journey to find out who you really are.

name: Dream Aether
description:
Dive deeper and deeper into dreams in this short musical experience.

This is link 6 in the Haunted PS1 C.H.A.I.N..

name: Idle Void
description: Idle Void is an idle game about collecting particles within a black hole.

name: Reborn
description:
You are who you want to be.

Your VR social game platform.

All worlds built by open creative community with love.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Big Wheel
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Big Wheel. Manufactured by Bally in 1968.

name: Boaty Tanks 2
description: Get ready for exciting naval combat with Boaty Tanks 2! Take control of a small boat as you navigate through various biomes, armed with your trusty weapons. But be warned - enemy ships are out to get you!

name: Train Simulator Classic: Bernina Pass Scenario Pack 01
description: New challenges await on the picturesque Bernina Pass with new scenarios created by SGL.

name: I am OK
description: Join the talented photography student Neera on a captivating journey through her memories. Haunted by recurring nightmares, her life spirals into chaos, questioning everything. Involuntarily, she returns to a place she once left behind: her childhood home.

name: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Enjoy the End of the World
description: Turn-Based RPG set in post-Covid times where you take on an elite secret society that is depopulating the world using Saturnalian Monsters, Military, Hospital and Government personnel to conquer humanity. Satire/Parody/Comedy.

name: Twistex
description: Twistex is a falling block puzzle game with a 'twist'. Made especially for VR, it combines classic gameplay with original new mechanics. 2 game types, 2 modes, 48 levels, unlockables and customization.

name: Touch Grass Together
description: Touch Grass with your friends, or on your own if you're into that sort of thing, we won't judge even if it is a little weird.

name: Conquest of Eldinar
description: Conquest of Eldinar is a 2.5D Action RTS where you can choose from 16 different epic fantasy Factions to play as while you build bases, train armies, and engage in thrilling battles in either dynamic singleplayer campaigns or competitive online multiplayer.

name: Up or Lava!
description: Participate in only up races with 100 players. Fall down, and you'll burn in the lava! Play with friends or other players. The last survivor wins. Could it be you?

name: TD Tactics
description: TD Tactics is a combination of Tower Defense and Auto Battler genres. Use your cards to cast spells, combine and upgrade towers, and make use of different synergies to defeat your enemies.

name: Summer at Catmai: Fishing Purrrfected
description: A third-person, cozy adventure game set during a young teenage girl's summer getaway. Travel to Catmai Lake and learn different styles of fishing, how to catch bugs, and learn the importance of family.

name: Platform Gun
description: A sci-fi puzzle platformer using the platform gun

name: Arthas 2
description: The continuation of a great game about a great man!

name: Totoge
description: Totoge is a fast-paced one-button game. You control a chicken that is constantly falling down towards one of the sides of the screen. Your goal is to avoid landing on the randomly appearing spikes. Press a button to jump in the air and you will score additional points for jumping depending on the distance passed. You will turn around when you hit the sides of the screen. The game is over when you hit the spikes.

name: Colorful Boi
description: Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled journey like no other with Colorful Boi! This captivating platformer boasts 63 levels of intense gameplay, filled with treacherous traps.

name: Midnight Submersion: Nightmare Horror Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Party Time: Party Even Harder Pack
description: The party just got even more fun! Enjoy 10 new minigames! Get ready for Party Even Harder, a new downloadable content pack for Party Party Time! Enjoy 10 brand new minigames! Party even harder together!

name: Rodolfo Mascarpone y Ramón Cazanuecos: Amenaza en el Molinillo
description: Get ready to experience a thrilling 3D sidescroller action adventure with our beloved characters Rodolfo Mascarpone and Ramón Cazanuecos, created by Borja Pavón and The Catacroquer who have also lent their voices in this exciting two-player co-op story!

name: Soulstice: Ashen Blade Item Pack
description: The balance of the Holy Kingdom of Keidas is compromised when powerful, feral creatures known as “Wraiths” invade from the other side of the Veil, threatening to consume the living. The “Chimeras”, hybrid warriors born of the union of two souls, are the only ones who can protect humankind.

name: Sherwood Extreme: Rogue Level Pack
description: Expand the world of Sherwood Extreme with 3 NEW LEVELS! Experience new challenges at record-breaking speeds. Discover new locations. Compete online for leaderboard glory.

name: Tower Forge: Dark Defense
description: Tower Forge: Dark Defense is a roguelite RTS tower defense game focusing on crafting. Forge hundreds of unique towers to your liking. Deal with ever-changing routes of enemies and prove your tactical mastery. Struggle, learn, gather resources, forge new towers, and defeat the corrupted enemies!

name: Slime Siege
description: Slime Siege is a vibrant tower defense with rogue-lite elements. Level up, find perfect item combinations, mow down hordes of slimes or fail trying! Strategize and create unique item builds for every map to endure the onslaught. How long can you survive?

name: Century: Age of Ashes - Skaltir Apostate Pack
description: Don the mantle of Phantoms' ancestors and awaken the dark powers of Nogir, a legendary dragon born from rituals designed to create the perfect guardian. No one knows the true strength of this mythical Dragon - but soon, they shall see…

name: Afterlife Gladiator
description: Warriors, mysterious creatures and even prehistoric animals have all become trapped in a realm beyond death where once a year they must fight each other in a team tournament for the ultimate prize: Freedom.

name: Northgard: Kernev, Clan of the Stoat
description: Independent and protective, the populations of Kernev occupy autonomous territories, but they will unite in battle under the command of their powerful Lords. Nominoe's knowledge of Viking cultures and diplomatic ways give the Kingdom the adaptability and allies to match any challenge.

name: From Light
description: Embark on a journey through a kingdom ravaged by plague, greed and magic. You are the only who can bring about their salvation, and yours also depends on your success in that task!

name: Merchant Master
description: A simulation game. Start from scratch to build a merchant empire.

name: Project: Ahno's Ark
description: This game merges elements of tactical RPG, Go, and introduces Roguelite features. Players will need to make decisions among numerous random events and capability divergences, trying to survive in an apocalyptic game of mutual destruction.

name: Goblin Invasion
description: Goblin Invasion is a tower defense/tower attack game where you paly as a commander of goblin forces. Summon trained warriors of different ranks and direct your attack on the monolithic towers of arrogant elves. The towers, in turn, will give decent resistance to the attacks of archers and magicians.

name: Furry Myth
description: Furry Myth is about amazing myths of ancient Greece and charming furry characters! Embark on an adventure!

name: Super Mayor
description: A feel-good 2D platformer where you play as a councillor to a rural farming district in New Zealand! Solve problems, meet the public, and become MAYOR in this hilarious, story-rich adventure.

name: Ada: Tainted Soil
description: Step into the world of Ada, a story-driven single-player 2D top-down action RPG with fast-paced combat and stunning visuals to enjoy. Combine different weapons, spells, and skills to overcome all obstacles in your way. Be prepared for the unexpected.

name: Breath of Space
description: Join Uzay on a rescue mission in Breath of Space, a breathtaking third-person shooter rogue-lite/roguelike. Fight your way through an invaded space facility alongside your companion droid, who carries your life essence. Choose to risk your droid to help you or face even greater challenges alone.

name: Monica's Newlywed Life
description: When Kyle and his party's adventure comes to an abrupt end, Kyle decides to ask Monica to marry him. Starting a new life in the countryside, they must earn a living, and get to know their new home.

name: Monster Prom 2: Monster Camp - Monster Camp Outfit Pack
description: MOSTER PORM IS B4CK, BABY! You missed your all-time favs from renowned dating sim Moster Porm? Worry no more! They're all back, ready to enjoy Summer camp!

name: Epicus Royale
description: Epicus Royale is a free-to-play third-person shooter battle royale, highlighting close combat fighting and special abilities for a dynamic multiplayer experience. Dive into the development journey with us and explore early builds as we shape the game’s future together.

name: Excite Bowling
description: "Excite Bowling" is an experience game released by Epoch in 2002. It was released as one of the "experimental games" (Taikan game) series. It is a hardware-integrated plug-and-play game that uses XaviX technology. Later, "XaviX Bowling", which can be said to be the successor software, was released on "XaviXPORT", a hardware dedicated to XaviX technology.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 2 - Battle For the Port
description: The new season is set to introduce a ton of content such as the new Storm Warning mode, a new Port map, and a plethora of weapons. The upcoming season will also mark the beginning of a new series of seasons that have been planned for the game.

name: SawCon 64
description: Bowser's stole some power stars and dropped saws everywhere! Get the stars back to save Mushroom Kingdom.

name: Ghost of Catsushina
description: Ghost of Catsushina - is an action-adventure platformer. The action takes place on the island, when damage penetrates into the jade dream of the guardian spirit, the warrior awakens and sees that his homeland has been destroyed. Set out on a journey to defeat the filth.

name: Flow of Sound
description: Please help balls of various colors reachs to destination. Meet the ball that is created and disappears to the music of the atmosphere. You can feel healing just by looking at the beautiful and brilliant ball.

name: Floating Coffin
description: A short cinematic survival experience where you attempt to survive on a failing satellite. Worry about all the survival essentials along with a ever growing blackhole named Ebon Void pulling lethal debris your way.

name: Janet DeMornay is a Slumlord (and a witch)
description: Live the anxieties and horrors of what it is to be a renter in a world run by landlords. …and your landlord is a witch.

name: Angels & Demons
description:
Platformer, RPG, Rhythm Game?!
Angels & Demons is a multi-genre mashup!

The Spiritual Barrier has been broken! It's up to you, and your guardian angel Yui, to fix it! Travel the world and fight off demons from The Seven Deadly Sins in a quest to find The Seven Runes of Virtue! Can you fix The Barrier and restore order to The Living Realm?

name: Programmer Dungeon Knightress: Samurai Pack
description: In this DLC, get "Jack the Samurai" as a playable character, customization of the level selection map and 5 additional new levels.

name: Sword of the Cat: Lost Hope
description: A semi-open-world action RPG in a medieval-styled modern world. Fifty years after a great time disaster that killed most of mankind, two factions start looking for a way to restore the old world.

name: Thor's Ascension: Nine Realms
description: Rule the god of thunder and challenge all the gods of the nine realms! In this Rogue-like, hack and slash game, develop your strategy and skills, subject all the gods who challenge you to your wrath, and become the only god of the universe.
